Title: Confusing sizing, fit too big
Review: Tried to replace my pair of crocs that have worn out. Sizing must have changed as 9 too big, 8 too small. Sizing also confusing. My son and wife also bought some, his were a bit big, hers were just right? Had to return both mine, good job returns are easy on amazon
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 August 2019

Title: Really comfy
Review: Great comfy shoe in nice colour. Wouldn't ever want to be seen out the house wearing them but for the home they are great and so comfy.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Lemon
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 December 2020

Title: Good fit, ultra lightweight- perfect
Review: These are branded Crocs so I knew they would be a good loose fit. I was expecting s wide fit and they were. They are what I was expecting and are perfect. Ultra lightweight too. Perfect for the beach and paddling!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 July 2019

Title: Comfortable, Waterproof and Easy
Review: I finally succumbed to buying some Crocs after years of the in-laws saying how great they are. I bought them to go camping in France for wearing around the campsite/tent, slipping on for late night trips to the toilet, and generally ambling about. They are perfect for all these things. They are easy to slip on and off, they keep your feet surprisingly warm and they are comfortable straight out of the box. I would not wear them for long walks.Be warned: they should not be used for a fashion statement and they should not be decorated with little Croc trinkets. This behaviour will just make you look silly unless you are under 5 years of age.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 July 2013

Title: Good quality, but not right shape for my feet
Review: I was slightly disappointed by these. The insoles did not feel as comfortable or supportive as I'd hoped, and the size of the shoe was almost too short for my feet- it felt like my heel was hanging off the end of the shoe. However, width-wise, they felt too loose around my foot and wouldn't stay on unless I used the strap, which then pushed my foot forwards and squashed my toes. I wanted to use these as shoes/slippers to jump in and out of around the house, therefore they are no good for me and I will be returning them.
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Chocolate
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 March 2016

Title: Lovely bright green.
Review: Perfect. I have large, rectangular feet, crocs bring superb comfort. Delivery via DHL was not fun, but parcel arrived eventually.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 September 2020

Title: Crocs
Review: Sizing is a bit weird.  I'm a UK women's 6 and I ordered these in a UK 9 and they are perfect.  They seem to be wearing quite well although I don't use them everyday, mainly in the garden or going round to the village shop. Shame there is such a stigma with wearing these as I think they are great and comfortable as well.  Was toying with the idea of getting a nice lime green pair but decided to go with a conservative black.  Now I'm an official Croc lover I may well go crazy and order the lime green as a second pair!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 June 2014

Title: Rubber deadpool monkey spank shoes
Review: After watching Deadpool I thought i would get myself some rubber pleasuring clogs.To stay with the Ryan Reynolds theme I thought I'd watch another of his movies whilst having my "private time". Not Good...I angry wanked all through the green lantern - I now have severe friction burns.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 August 2019

Title: Buy a size larger!
Review: I’m always a size 6 shoe. My toes were squashed at the ends of these in a size 6. Fortunately I can still wear them comfortably when I put the strap over the top of my foot rather than around the back of my heel. Great for in the garden but wished I had bought a size larger.

Title: Great for VERY wide feet

I now have to decide whether to go to hassle of sending them back or keep a pair of shoes that will slip off the whole time.

Title: Best investment you will make
Review: Wouldn't be without these. They are my slippers. I can go outside and not have to worry, leave them next to the front door for when I come home and another pair next to my bed, so always one knocking about

Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 January 2020

Title: Ease
Review: Bought these so I can slouch in my slipper socks all day and jump into my Crocs when deliveries come to the gate.😍😍😍
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 November 2020

Title: genuine Crocs. Navy adult size 5
Review: I have worn crocs for caravaning and at home for 5 years, they are comfy without socks and easy to slip on and off. I bought these for my son to wear in the same way. they are brilliant value for money. I do not think as them as a substitute for shoes but unlike the cheaper inferior ones do not harm your feet. When worn the heat from your feet moulds crocs to be a comfortable and good supportive fit, you can wear them on the beach as the holes allow any water to drain. Hence why the boating, caravanning and nurses have worn them for years.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 June 2013

Title: crocs as good as ever
Review: I've had several pairs of Crocs and worn each pair out. These replacements fit well, are light and robust. Once again I expect long service from them.

Title: Love them!
Review: Bought these to replace a cheap pair of imitation crocs. Had enjoyed the ease of use and comfort, but not really robust enough. Now I have the real thing, can't understand why I doubted. Super to wear.

Title: Lovely yellow, comfy and lasts.

We decided on Crocs as it lasts a lot longer then the average home slippers and is comfortable, you also get a little foot massage via the textured foot surface. Love it!

Title: Must have purchase!

Title: wrong size
Review: Gave these to my mother as a gift - bought at the same time as another pair for me which are perfectly sized. She has only just told me (as she didn't want to offend me) that she can't wear them as they are too small. On comparing them, although both pairs are marked Size 5, this pair is at least 2 sizes smaller and therefore unusable. Most disappointing as it's now too late to do anything about it.

Title: Crocs Rock
Review: I love these, they're super vibrant and the colours are true to the photos. Super comfy and easy to slip on. Mine are covered in charms and not exactly subtle but they make me smile every time I wear them.

Title: Why did I wait buying ...
Review: Rest of family have used Crocks for years, i wasn't sure but finally persuaded. Not disappointed and will buy a second pair soon!

Title: Nice crocs
Review: Bought these for my husband and they are lovely, when you get the size right!  I did my research and thought I'd made the right choice, but the original pair ordered were just too large.  Was able to return without quibble, however, and a smaller size ordered to replace them.  I don't have any advice to give about the sizing - it seems the only way to get it right is to try them on.

Title: Confusion with sizes
Review: Ordered size UK7. When arrived, package said UK8 and sole said US8. After two replacements found I out that in 2015 Crocs changed size classifications and US8 on sole is equivalent to UK7. There is obviously an error on package label. These are genuine Crocs and exceptional value for money. Just be aware, as in other reviews, of size classifications.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 January 2016

Title: Comfy
Review: I have very wide feet and wear a size 7 trainers, and my daughter has narrower feet and also wears a size 7 (41). We both think these crocs are very comfortable, although we have only worn them in the garden and not tried longer walls in them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 November 2020

Title: 3 goes to get the right size!
Review: Great, so comfy to wear but nightmare to get the right size! My husband usual takes a size 11, after reading so many reviews that these come up small/large inconsistent I decided to go for his regular size, these were way too big, I them ordered him a M10/W11 still too big, so in the end the M9/W10 was the best fit (if a little on the small side). So to summarise, order a couple of pairs and sent the ones that don't fit back! Thank goodness for Amazon Prime and Free Returns.

Title: highly recommended
Review: this is 2nd pair ive bought as so impressed with first ones well made and lot better than 5.99 ones i had previously bought but rear strap broke within 5 minutes so happy these are much beter made. i had previously bought a pair of crocs yukons fron local mall at £40!!!!! but these are just as good at less than half the price wish i had found sooner before shelling out for the others also fit perfectly and very comfortable taking them on hols with me

I did the research and found that Amazon had the best prices and free delivery.She normally takes a size 7 shoe so we ordered a size 7 clog.The first pair were slightly too small but Amazon quickly changed them to the next size up and paid for return postage which was briliant.The size 8 are perfect and she is happily working in the garden in them.

Title: An Excellent Buy!
Review: I like everything about Crocs, they are extremelly comfortable to wear, long lasting and come with a wonderful array of colours. I have been buying them for many, many years.

Title: Good looking crocs

Title: Sizing on Crocs
Review: My son love Crocs and his we’re getting really worn and scruffy. So I ordered him a new pair of UK size 12. However, when he received them and tried them on, they were too big. The packaging stated size 12 but the size on the Crocs were 13. I had to return them.

Title: Was advised by the size guide to buy M5/F6 which ...
Review: Was advised by the size guide to buy M5/F6 which it said was a size 6. It wasnt, was a size 5. The colour is a garish pink not the strong pastel pictured. Asked to return, never heard back from seller after opening a case and waiting 3 weeks. Eventually had amazon intervene and got my money back. Be careful with the size recommendations and dont expect 'Candy' Pink or a response from the seller!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 April 2017

Title: Versatile and Incredibly Comfortable
Review: I wore out my old pair of Crocs and I expect to wear these out too, but  they will last a good couple of years. They may be unfashionable these days but they are incredibly comfortable and versatile. On my feet they are quite loose, with or without socks (yes, I'm unfashionable enough to wear sock with sandals), but the next smaller size is slightly too tight for my comfort, but they have never fallen off.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 May 2016

Title: Crocs for HUGE feet !
Review: Great product at a competitive price.  Husband has such large feet that I struggle to find crocs to fit, these are perfect.  In his size (13) the colour choices are very limited but the khaki green ones are fine.  The last ones I bought from here have lasted an age, they even go in the washing machine safely.  A great buy

Title: These were fine for my son
Review: These were fine for my son. Crocs are always a bit roomy which is fine as we use them as quick slip on's or beach, or swim lessons.  They do feel a little stiffer than some crocs I buy which have a bit softer feel when walking, but these are Crocs and you can never go wrong.

Title: Fit for the value.
Review: I ordered a size 10UK but received a size 11UK but they aren’t important enough for the effort of returning and getting them exchanged as they’re just for use outside of the house.Work well for what is required such as putting the bins out and taking my dog into the garden. Comfortable and sturdy enough that they don’t feel like they’ll break soon.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 September 2019

Title: Super Crocs at a great price!
Review: I bought these Crocs because my original pair were beginning to look quite worn after 3 years of stirling service. I was delighted with the prompt service and with my new pair of Crocs. They are a lovely colour and a very good price, much cheaper than the original pair. The quality is excellent although the fabric seems to be a little less flexible and not quite as soft as my previous crocs. However, they look great and I would highly recommend them, I'm already considering another pair... there are so many delicious colours to choose from!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 November 2010

Title: Ordered correct size, got sent the wrong one!!  :-(
Review: Oh dear.  Why oh why is it so difficult to get the correct fitting crocs?  I ordered the same size as my old ones (which fit perfectly), new ones arrived promptly  :-)  BUT they sent a different size to the one I ordered!!!!  :-(I love Crocs - use them instead of slippers all the time around the house.  Desperate to get another pair, (as lost one when took my previous pair out the house).  Will order again.

Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 October 2019

Title: half size bigger?
Review: Absolutely love these! I was another sniffy person about Crocs...certainly never thought they would be for me but they are just like walking on air, well made and incredibly comfortable.  Delivery was very quick and the colour is exactly as shown.  Reason for 4 stars is that, as others have commented, they are a tad small in my usual size 6.  A 7 I suspect would be too big.  They don't rub or hurt in anyway and I wear them all the time but I'm a bit aware that my big toe is right up against the top of the shoe, half size up would be perfect.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 June 2013

Title: good product
Review: Comfy, people with wide feet should buy one size up.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 December 2019

Title: comfort wonder!!
Review: A friend gave me a pair of crocs a while ago to try as I have a cut on my foot that won't heal and causes great pain when I walk on it, I tried them and was amazed, the pain disappears as soon as i put them on, I suffer from bunion pain and crocs also combat this and offer great relief.  I also put these on as soon as I get out of bed as previously I was unable to stand correctly on my right foot due to the pain it causes, as soon as I slip on my crocs the pain goes and I have no problem walking.  Would recommend these to anyone who has foot problems as they mould to your feet and offer instant relief.  I now have four pairs. They may not be the nicest looking shoe in the world but right now my comfort comes first!!
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 April 2010

Title: Not genuine Crocs
Review: These are not genuine Crocs. After ordering these I decided to pay the £10 extra and order from the official Crocs website and whilst they look almost identical, these ones are a harder, plastic-style material whereas the genuine Crocs are more malleable and rubbery (and therefore higher quality). I'm sure these are fine but it's definitely worth spending slightly more for the real thing.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 August 2019

Title: Amazing service
Review: Bought these for my Grandaughter she thinks they are great.Came next day, great service  :-))
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 August 2020

Title: Super value
Review: Bought them for my Husband, who goes through a lot of slippers. Great that you can easily wash these. Did not think he would like them, as he is kind of set in his ways. However, he surprised me by saying he found them very comfortable. I think the only thing he has never really liked, is the fact they have a very wide toe. That's his preference though. Would definitely buy again and am thinking of getting some for myself in a different colour..
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 March 2015

Title: Pretty good croc overall
Review: When they arrived had US size and frowned and thought too big. But they are the right size - certainly generous rather than tight making them super cool for summer!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 June 2020

Title: Great Product
Review: I like the product as it is an easy slip on/slip off style allowing the freedom of walking barefoot but not having to stop and put shoes on if you just want to pop outside.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 September 2019

Title: Okay, but...
Review: I bought these Crocs because I have other colours which I love, but these black ones appear to be of inferior quality.  The plastic is a lot harder and ungiving and therefore not nearly as comfortable.  Maybe they will soften in time, but I see no reason why a different colour should be any different in quality, especially as the price remains the same and I suspect these are manufactured by a different company, using cheaper materials.
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 April 2015

Title: Brilliant Present
Review: As a comedic present to my partners dad, it went from ironic to his favourite shoe - god, Ilove crocs!
Size: Size: 7 UK Men/ 8 UK WomenColour: Bronze
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 September 2020

Title: Comfy Crocs
Review: Bought them for myself but ended up giving them to my nephew who needed a new pair.  He loved them, wouldn't let me take them off his feet!  Crocs clogs are wide fitting in general and he has wide feet, so they were comfortable for him.  Good buy.
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Chocolate
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 October 2018

Title: Great fit
Review: I have trouble with shoes, having an artificial leg one foot is a bit thinner and I'm sure a tad smaller than the real one. Last time I ordered a size twleve (not original crocs) which wore too loose, and became dangerous for me. I must admit I was dubious about buying these, but am so glad I did. They fit perfectly and I love them.Brilliant real crocs, fitted well (perfectly), very happy.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 April 2016

Title: Sizing an issue. Also, the plastic moulding is not perfect. Is this a genuine Croc?
Review: I have given the seller 5* because the reaction time was very good. I received the next size up the day I returned the original Croc. The sizing is very disappointing. UK5 was what I wanted, but it was too tight. UK6 is too big.
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Chocolate
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 April 2019

Title: Red Crocs
Review: I take a 6.5 shoe and the size 6 was too 'short' the width was fine but the length of the croc is definitely a size 6. The 7 is slightly too long so I have to wear the heel strap. They are very lightweight and very good to wear - not a fashion statement, I have resisted joining the croc brigade but I have been won over by the men in my life wearing crocs and me 'sneakily' slipping theirs on to go out in the garden. I did try cheaper brands but they are exactly-that poor imitations.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 March 2014

Title: Great invention
Review: Crocs are just fabulous ! This is my 3rd pair in different colours so I think that says it all. Light and easy to wear, I use them as slippers for indoors as well as going into the garden,popping to the local shop and as a poolside slip on. I wouldn't be without a pair.  I pop them in the shower with me when they look dusty, my daughter has even popped them in the washing machine. Her husband put them in the tumble dryer( WHY?) not a good move, they wouldn't fit me after and I am 2 sizes smaller!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 June 2013

Title: I COULDN'T CONTINUE WORKING WITHOUT THEM
Review: crocs saved my life!  well, my choice of employment, anyway.  i have been working on yachts as a chef (etc., etc.) for 25 years, and i'm on my feet between 12 and 20 hours per day.my feet were always painful, no matter what i wore to begin with.  but you live with it.  however, after the first 5 years, my legs and feet started to swell if we had guests on the boat for longer than 2-3 weeks in a row...eeek!  i really thought i would have to retire, as we started having people for more than 5 weeks.  no amount of drugs, infusions or snatched rest with my feet above my head helped.then along came a friend of ours, who had gotten himself a captain's job on the boat owned by the owners of crocs.  he was giving these shoes away.  we all said, NO, THEY ARE TOO UGLY!  he said, TRY THEM.  i did.and i've never looked back!i now own more than 5 pairs of all kinds, and some are not even ugly!but these, my "cooking shoes," (which i'm wearing now!) are the best things on the planet, i don't care what they look like!thanks, crocs!  i'm your biggest fan.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 June 2014

Title: Very happy with these Crocs
Review: I purchased these Crocs as a gift for my 80 year-old mother. She finds the fit very comfortable and the material and the shape of them makes her feel very sturdy on her feet while she walks. This is the third pair she owns and she doesn't wear anything else most days.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 June 2020

Title: I'm 18 years old... I'm in love
Review: OH MY GOODNESS? Honestly I'm a size 8/9 (depending on the type of shoe) and I ordered a size 7 because all of the reviews said to order down a size, they really fit like a glove! They are so comfortable, I want them to be some kind new fashion trend just so I can wear them out without shame. Really though I'm a person who likes dressing for comfort instead of style; and I couldn't of found a better piece of footwear!Only negatives I would have to point out is that all of my flat mates have rejected me XD
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 April 2014

Title: Great colour Great Fit
Review: I am a size UK 7 women's wide foot and this classic Croc is perfect width wise and length.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 May 2019

Title: great shoe
Review: Didn't think I'd ever wear a croc but wife bought for using in garden and I wear everywhere now!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 August 2020

Title: TOO BIG TO BE COMFORTABLE
Review: I BOUGHT THESE CROCS AND THE UNISEX BAYA CLOG TO COMPARE FIT. I BOUGHT THEM BOTH IN A 5 AFTER TRYING THESE ON IN A LOCAL SHOP & FINDING THESE A BETTER FIT THAN THE 6 CONSIDERING I USUALLY WEAR A 5.5 TO 6. BUT FOUND EVEN THE 5 WAS NOT A COMFORTABLE FIT, WHEREAS THE CLOG STYLE SHOE WAS. ALSO MADE MY FEET LOOK LIKE BOATS!!AM UNSURE WHAT THE SIZING ON THE BOTTOM OF THE SHOE IS & EVEN THE SHOP STAFF COULDN'T HELP ME. THEREFORE, THESE WERE SENT BACK.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 May 2014

Title: Uk 8 fits my uk 8 foot!
Review: I haven’t worn them on a big walking trip yet so can’t comment on rubbing or comfort after wearing them for a long time- but I know there is a lot of confusion over size! I’m an women’s uk 8 - I chose the size that said women uk 8 and they are fine! Hope this helps someone!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 May 2018

Title: Careful with size
Review: Be careful when ordering, the size is men's first, womens second, picker will choose mens size even for women.?????
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 September 2020

Title: Gardening and lounging
Review: Crocs are so comfy, slip them on inside or out, if recommend a pair for each. Very comfy with either socks or without.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Lemon
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 June 2020

Title: Indestructable, and really comfy
Review: I think that kids should be allowed to wear crocs for school, they are completely indestructable.  My son took these on holiday last May and has worn them all summer and then through the winter to nip out in the garden etc.  They are just brilliant and given the choice he wouldn't wear anything else on weekends we normally have the conversation of 'can I wear my crocs?'
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 April 2016

Title: Comfy footwear
Review: I have had mine a good while now and really love them, great for around the house, going to training and for short works (not ideal for long walks or terrain that requires stability), they wash well and dry quickly, both myself and my wife wear these alot.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 April 2018

Title: Comfortably great shoes
Review: I have been a fan of crocs for years but had let my collection run down as they gradually wore out. However, I saw these at a good price so bought them...then after about two-weeks foot-enjoyment bought another identical pair.I have never found a pair of shoes that are instantly so comfortable. I have a wide foot and they are perfect for me. These, I am pleased to say, are made in Italy rather than China, so seem to be evidence of a return of manufacturing to the EU. As a Brit I would like to see them made in the UK, of course!Downside to the shoes? The holes in the front let in small stones on the beach, and when the soles wear they become very slippery. Best to use them as slippers at that stage...
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 September 2013

Title: Another comfortable pair of Crocs
Review: As a Croc regular these are as comfortable and practical as those that went before.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 July 2020

Title: Love the colour!
Review: I read all the reviews befor buying these, my first pair of crocs, and took the advise to buy a size larger as these were made in China and were a bit on the small side.  However when they arrived they were made in Italy!  Not sure if a size smaller would have been too small though. There's plently of room, and they fit better with the strap around the heel. Wore them this morning with thin socks and they were fairly snug.  I bought these crocs because I've had a pair of bargain "Fitflops" sandals from a charity shop the past year, which are very comfortable, but wanted something for the cooler days that I could wear with or without socks and couldn't afford the fitflop clogs.Overall these crocs fit the bill - well priced - comfortable - love the colour!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 June 2014

Title: Excellent fit! Highly recommend.
Review: Brilliant product, would definitely recommend. Perfect fit at a good price. Arrived next day as expected. Hope they last 7 years like my last ones did.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 July 2020

Title: Perfect! As expected
Review: Absolutely love them! Went a size smaller, as with all crocs and they fit like a glove. And everyone at work comments on the colour. As bright as in the picture! :-D
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 August 2020

Title: Very good
Review: I work 12hr shifts at the hospital and obviously on my feet all day . Very comfy and sturdy.  Like the nobbly bits inside gives good grip for the soles of your feet
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 May 2020

Title: Love 'em
Review: No need to write a review really.Set aside the appearance, if you don't love Crocs it's probably because you've never owned a pair.(And if you're debating buying a cheap repro pair - don't. The real Crocs are WELL worth the extra money.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black

Title: Brilliant Crocs, the fit is perfect I've only ever ...
Review: Brilliant Crocs, the fit is perfect I've only ever bought cheaper ones before but thought I'd try the real ones this time, I mainly use these for slippers and in the garden, my old pairs I wash in the washing machine on a short cool wash and they always come out as new, they arrived so promptly after ordering that I was surprised it was so quick, would order from this company again.

Title: No socks needed!
Review: Very comfy and easy to wear. Usually wear them without the strap at the back and they grip and stay on perfectly

Title: buy one size bigger

Title: Sizing not accurate
Review: Had to wait for a short while for them, as they were out of stock. When they arrived, had to return them as they were too big. I ordered size 7 UK Mens and my wife, who is size 8 could get them on.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 February 2019

Title: Crocs
Review: Well made, used as slippers, keep feet cool, comfy, can wear out!  None slip, second pair, first make we're holy sole or something like that and lasted over ten years, I wore everyday and on holidays and in sea. Crocs are better quality and for £17 can't go wrong, been looking to replace my old ones for years and  £30 plus every where glad I waited for price drop to more than half, well looks like crocs aren't getting another sale from me for another 10 years hopefully.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 November 2013

Title: Love my Crocs

Title: Genuine Crocs Rock
Review: Always love my Crocs. Comfy, practical and light as a feather. None of the others come close to genuine Crocs.

Title: Crocs are still a classic!
Review: Bought these crocs to replace a previous pair that had lasted the best part of 6/7 years.  The new ones look and fit exactly the same and seem to be of the same good, hard wearing quality.

Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Tangerine

Title: comfy but ugly

Title: a great multi use shoe
Review: These are comfortable versatile shoes which you can wear on the beach or around the house or doing a spot of gardening in, they can be washed under the tap so it doesn`t matter how dirty you get them. the shoe is quite a soft rubber/plastic material so it absorbs shock so your feet are less likely to ache with fatigue, one thing to note the sizes are a little bigger than normal, i bought these for my girlfriend who normally takes a size 6 but she has a size 5 in crocs which fit her perfectly.
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 January 2012

Title: Classic croc

Title: Wish I'd purchased sooner.
Review: After trying my sister’s, I just had to order a pair for myself as they were so comfy! I don’t buy shoes for looks…comfort all the way! My crocs arrived today, I only planned to wear them to the bin or the corner shop (convenient slip on shoes)…I have not removed them from my feet since I put them on!! They are so comfy, taken them up town and beyond, still on me now in the house (don't wear shoes inside). Will be ordering a secondary pair ASAP because no doubt I will burn these babies right through in no time! Seriously happy!
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 April 2016

Title: Comfortable as always.

Title: Camping footwear
Review: Just the job for garden and camping, my third pair, brilliant a must have for camping.

Title: I love crocs
Review: Go to summer wear. Good for gardening, beech or just pottering. Easy to wear, easy to clean.

Title: Comfortable fit well
Review: Fits great.  Never had them off my feet since I bought them red’s my favourite colour so pleased

Title: Size varies depending on manufacturer
Review: Excellent product, at first I thought too big but feel great now.Sizes vary with crocs as I ordered another pair and they too small

Title: Incorrect sizing
Review: I read various reviews about crocs before ordering, and gathered from most that the sizings can be hit or miss. I therefore ordered two different styles and two different sizes.Jolly glad that i did. My normal size is a 6, but the size 6 that i ordered looked more like a childs shoe. There was no way my feet were going to fit into those. The pair i ordered in a different size and style fitted perfectly. My advice for this product would be to either order two pairs in different sizes or go for 2 sizes bigger than you would normally wear.
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 December 2014

Title: Great purchase!
Review: Hubbie loves them hasn’t taken them off since receiving wasn’t taken with crocs previously ! good buy!
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 July 2020

Title: I'm annoyed at how much I like them
Review: I begrudgingly bought them as my hospital brought in new infection control rules because of covid. They're annoying comfortable and practical.

Title: Highly reccommended
Review: Bought large for foot injury great for slipping on and going in garden and around the house, better support than flipflop have bouht more

Title: Comfy and practical
Review: exactly what you'd expect, hard wearing and comfy. Maybe advise to get a size slightly bigger than you need as mine are a little small

Title: A convert!
Review: Superb product, unbelieveably comfortable and practical. My first pair, I'm a convert.

Title: Fab for around the garden
Review: I know that Crocs get bad press for style but I absolutely love them for around the garden. Easy to slip on and very comfortable. The sizing requires some attention though and if I am honest I should probably have got the next size but couldn't bear to send them back!
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Lilac
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 August 2019

Title: Crocs
Review: I am happy with the crocs especially as it is the only shoe I can wear
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 August 2020

Title: Average. Not great support to arches
Review: Weird fitting, make sure you’re getting a woman’s size not a men’s. And I would get a size smaller.Also the arch support is not great, wearing all day in hospital setting and when I take them off I feel such relief to put on a pair of trainers.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 May 2020

Title: Otherwise they are the most comfortable summer shoes I've ever bought
Review: These are my fifth pair of Crocs - and exactly as I expected. Having heard some adverse comments about Crocs, It is very important  to discard them when the soles wear flat as they can become dangerous in wet conditions. Otherwise they are the most comfortable summer shoes I've ever bought. The fit is important as they should always be a bit big - as advised in the original Crocs fitting guide.JUDITH MACBETH
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 August 2014

Title: I love my new fuchsia clogs!
Review: Crocs may be ugly, but they are enormously comfortable and practical. Crocs are my preferred every day footwear. This is the 6th pair of Crocs that I've bought in the last 6 years. The soles do wear smooth eventually and become dangerously slippery on wet surfaces, so worn out Crocs must be binned and replaced. Crocs are great for the beach, sailing, camping, gardening and anywhere where your feet might get wet. Many naturists wear them on the beach or at their club sites. I love my new summery fuchsia Crocs!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 July 2012

Title: Size too big but good quality and good price...old man now wears them
Review: I got these for holiday & had to get another pair a size down,for some reason getting the right size croc is a bit of a headache...my brother liked mine so he bought some whilst on our hols for 3x the price,they are comfy & perfect for lounging about the beach in

Title: Love these!
Review: Wouldn't have paid more than the promotion at £20 but I do love them!  And even though they were only in yellow they're perfect for what I wanted.  Live by my back door for nipping out to the garden, etc.

Title: Good.
Review: Comfortable for me. Like them a little loose, with a high instep.

Title: I like crocs a lot

Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 July 2014

Title: Good quality but small fit

Title: Not anything like a size I previously ordered
Review: These crocs were physically much smaller than an identical pair of crocs bought previously, of the same size. They were too small, and had to be returned. Interestingly they were made in Vietnam, whereas the original pair were from China.

Title: Very big
Review: Very very big! My daughter wears a size 4, but these were huge on her. Would definitely recommend buying a smaller size.

Title: Very pleased with purchase

Title: Comfy

Title: First class.
Review: I have only had my Crocs for a few weeks, but cannot find fault. Smart, comfortable and feel like the real deal.I have found them to be cool - you can actually feel the air circulating around your feet. That is a lovely feeling. However also warm, when it goes chilly.  The bump pattern, on the internal sole, provides a lovely sensation. No sign of wear and tear yet, but I cannot say how these will last.So far I am a very happy purchaser.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 September 2012

Title: Soooo Comfortable
Review: Bought these as a birthday present for my father who suffers from chronic athritis in the feet. These shoes offer great arch support and therefore help ease the discomfort / aches & pains in the feet. In addition to this, they can obviously be worn in a whole host of scenarios; beach, sea, garden etc etc. They might not be the most attractive looking show, but they are so comfortable and very good value for money. They're hard wearing - I've had a pair for well over a year, which still look like new. Go on, give them a try!
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 August 2010

Title: Comfy Crocs
Review: These crocs are so comfy and fit snugly. I've purchased cheaper versions in the past yet these are so much better. Worth the money.

Title: OK

Title: Excellent & Great Price

Title: Heel strap disintegrated

Title: Perfect - they live by the garden door as they ...
Review: Living in a coastal area with plenty of mud, plus having three dogs, I bought these purely to enable me to go out in the garden in the dark, or when raining, and not get mud or "doggy surprises"  on my shoes/boots/Converse. Perfect - they live by the garden door as they can be scrubbed under the garden tap if the inevitable happens. Also good on the beach.

Title: Crocs. Can’t beat the original

Title: Yet another pair

Title: Crocs Classic Black
Review: I have wide feet and always have had problems with shoes!  Chose the size 9 despite some reviewers saying they came up small. These are perfect and having had Crocs before, you definitely get what you pay for.  Have purchased cheap 'fiver a pair' look-a-likes before but lasted five minutes.  Crocs keep going - last pair was 2 years of constant use before binning (soles were smooth by now)!  Would recommend for a summer slipper too.

Title: Great for nipping out to the garden

Title: beach & garden

Title: Comfy. Good price. More air flow than a Scottish kilt

O And ingnore the whole grandad slippers vibe, trust me your feet will be happy 😉

Title: crocs adult classic black

I decided to treat myself to two more pairs, one coloured and a further pair of black.  They are so comfortable, you can put them on in the morning and not take them off 'til you go to bed. Title: Soooo comfortable!

I wanted these for indoor use instead of traditional slippers, and they're perfect for that.

Title: Great Crocs at a great price
Review: Ordered Crocs from Amazon as I know from experience they will arrive promptly, and they are competitively priced.  I used the Amazon locker collection facility which is great for deliveries.  As yet, I have been unable to return the Crocs using the locker facility (they are a size too big) as there is never a free locker for returns.  I have already ordered and received a size smaller as I needed them quickly, it's looking like I'll be keeping the size 9 crocs and hope they fit my son next year.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 August 2013

Title: The sizing of Crocs seems to be rather a random ...
Review: The sizing of Crocs seems to be rather a random business these days.This is the third pair I have purchased over the internet in the past year all three have failed tofit as expected. I future I will use a high street shop for my purchases of Cros shoes
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 February 2016

Title: Very nice and comfy.
Review: The best crocs which I bought and I have around 6 pairs.  Very comfy I wear them all day. Very happy with them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 September 2020

Title: Wear them all the time at home
Review: Comfortable and surprisingly cool - not sticky plastic as one would imagine. Can be slippery on wet surfaces. Make sure you get the right size, the label is at least one size bigger than the average for the same label in UK. If you wear women size 5 shoes, order size 4, which may also feel a bit on the large side.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 July 2015

Title: Too big
Review: Getting the right size pair of Crocs is always a challenge and feels like pot luck.This time I was unlucky.Most reviews say they come in small and you should buy the bigger size.I am a size 5 - 5.5 so I followed the advice and bought size 6.They were enormous - felt like a size 7So I sent them backWaiting for size 5 to arrive.Lovely colour though
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 August 2014

Title: So much better than the cheap version I've been slopping about in for years!
Review: Having worn a pair from a well known country store for a long time, I'm so glad I tried the real thing, especially as they were about the same price. They fit perfectly, however I'm actually a size 6.5 and bought a 7 as there were no half sizes. It may be necessary to buy a pair a little on the large size? Looking forward to spending the next 5 years in these - festivals and camping here we come ;-)
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 July 2014

Title: Guilty Secret: I love Crocs
Review: Gotta Love Crocs.  My guilty secret is wearing crocs around the house. They are the best slippers.  They don't mark the floor, keep your feet warm/cool depending on the season.  I have had plantar fascitis and tendonitis and these are the only shoes that don't hurt.  Love Crocs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 May 2016

Title: Very lightweightand very comfortable
Review: I wanted a pair of clogs for just slipping on and off around the house.  Though friends have told me before how comfortable Crocs are I've resisted buying them before as not sure about the patterned insole and width (I have narrow feet).  All my doubts have proved wrong - they are really comfortable.  I've been wearing them all the time at home and will certainly pack them for my next beach holiday.  They were also an excellent price (I've seen them for a lot more on the high street)
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 21 June 2013

Title: Classic crocs
Review: This is about my sixth pair of these classic crocs, because I find them invaluable as footwear for round about the house in the warmer weather.  I have had this colour before, but unfortunately our golden retriever decided to have a good chew at them when she was a puppy, so they have never been quite as smart since.  Pleased to get these at a good sale price.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 July 2013

Title: I shall have to return them. Too loose/sloppy fit ...
Review: I shall have to return them. Too loose/sloppy fit despite the correct shoe size chosen. Turns out they are classed as "roomy fit". This is a vague term. When I compared them to my old pair, the difference is in the extent of the scallop cut-out area on top of my foot. Thus it's more difficult to keep the croc on. It's a pity the advertisements do not make these subtle differences clear. I should have chosen a "baha" style fit apparently.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 June 2017

Title: Misleading size = unhappy customer
Review: I knew sizing might be a problem from other reviews, but I thought it had now been overcome, so that UK size 9 meant just that. I was wrong. UK size 9 is much smaller than Croc 'UK size 9'. I'm re-ordering as UK 8 and hoping for the best. From this and other experiences I've decided not to order any more footwear online but use a shop in future. There's no substitute for trying something on BEFORE buying it.

This is the first time I have bought and not paid over £30 for a pair and they are excellent quality . Lets see how the bases wear before I have to replace as dangerous in wet conditions !
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 July 2013

Title: Fugly but unbelievably practical and comfortable
Review: I bought these my second pair because they absolutely suit my lifestyle and these ghastly turd coloured things were the cheapest Crocs available.  However, if you regard fashion, daintiness, or nice colours even slightly important, then these fugly brown shoes are not for you.

Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 June 2014

Title: Pretty much as advertised
Review: Glad that the colour is more muted than shown here. Fit is very snug but acceptably so, but not the first size elevens that I've found that way, so I reckon it's me not the shoes. Strap folds neatly out of the way when used just as slip-ons. A good buy at £22.69!

Title: Practical around the house

All in all, we are really pleased with the Crocs we bought.

Review: There's nothing wrong with the crocs it's the sizing. I ordered a 9M, I need a 9M but have been sent a 10m. Apparently the sizing has changed but these are too big so in the end I returned them for a refund, despite them being a fantastic low price, and I shall shop elsewhere.

Title: As good as anyone says about them, no-one is exaggerating!
Review: I saw someone wearing a pair of Crocs Cayman, and liked the look - they recommended them, and although I had to keep trying to get a big enough size, I am a size 5 but had to go to 7 to get the width for me, I was thrilled.  The huge size does NOT look odd at all, and I have kept on getting more of the Cayman and the Baya - nice thing about Baya Watermelon, is that is has a metallic-like sheen - just a small comment!! I now have got 8 pairs, various colours from sensible to crazy, to indulge myself indoors!!  They do not slide off - I wear as clogs, strap over top, as I am unable to bend down to put on shies.  I do not have to worry about them slipping off, and they really are non-marking.  I find that they do not show scuffs as mushc as one person said, and I got some "Crocs Butter" anyhow, to wipe them if they get really scuffed or damaged.  They are fine in winter and summer, I have worn jeans socks inside them, but that was a bit o.t.t. and did stretch the pair after a while, but not enough to bother about.  Fine supermarket cotton socks are perfect if you need a bit of warmth or to hide unsightly ankles, like me. The only problem I have is one that demonstrates how GOOD they are: I have a bit of a job to "kick them off" at the door!  This shows how well they grip your feet, without you realising it.  They crease when kneeling or crouching, but the crease fades if left for a couple of days, unlike with leather shoes.  The best buy I have made in all my long life of shoes (having real problem feet - they are shaped like a duck!) No wonder our hospital staff wear them - on hard floors they are a cushion, on carpet they are like a soft mattress!  Amazon - I ought to have said to start with - delivery long before expected, absolutely NO problems with returning or queries, the best service I have received ever, and I do mean that.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 March 2010

Title: don't know what I'd do without them.....
Review: I remember the first pair of Caymans I bought; I stood in the shop, looking down at my Croc-clad feet and I said to the shop owner "God they're ugly...". He didn't take offence because after all he didn't design them but he did cautiously say "well they are very popular".Right ok then, because I needed something to wear around the house and there was no way I was ever going to allow anyone other than my husband and children to see me wearing them anyway.I'm on my second pair now, because after about 2 years of intense use the soles were worn smooth. I wear them all the time, indoors and out, school runs, beach, pool, supermarket. As anyone who owns a pair will know they are just sooooooo comfortable! The clunky look has grown on me and it's a bit of a cult thing isn't it? Besides, beauty's only skin deep and if you like your feet you'll give them Crocs, style be damned.The only thing I will say, in the hope that the Croc people might read this, is that I would love a selection of different designs colour-wise i.e. marbled or tie dye, in the adult sizes.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 June 2010

Title: Crocs Adult Cayman
Review: Great purchase. Had a bursa on my achilles tendon making any shoes impossible to wear. Have worn these every day this summer they are so comfortable. Many thanks to Amazon for dealing so fast and efficiently with the pathetic Royal Mail next day by 1pm delivery service. I waited until midday and then saw on the Royal Mail tracking site that they had already been delivered and if I didn't have them they must be at a neighbour's house! Tried the obvious neighbours, no, so we went out and came back to find.............a sorry you were not in card! Phoned up and complained and they arranged for a next working day delivery before 1pm. Didn't arrive again and the web site said they had been delivered at 7.31 am!! And this time nobody was answering the phones because of industrial action. Told Amazon the next day and they sent me a new pair, no quibbles, which arrived the next morning. Thanks Amazon. I have emailed and written complaints to the Royal Mail and have received...........no reply.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 August 2009

Title: Crocs Cayman clog
Review: I ordered these shoes for my partner, a size 40, but when they arrived we found them too large.  I'd also ordered a pair of Crocs Mammoth Clogs, which fitted snugly.  It is strange that two pairs of the same make of shoe should vary in sizing, but we noticed that they are made in different countries, which may have something to do with it.  Rather annoying!

Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 June 2010

Title: Fit as Expected After Research of the Brand
Review: When I first tried these shoes on I thought that they were too large. I'm a female who takes a UK 6.5 so I ordered the size 6men's/7female's. This size has actually turned out to be the correct size after having researched the way this particular model of these shoes should fit - I looked on the Crocs website (see pictures).  I would recommend that if you are unsure of what size to buy that you buy two pairs - after all one can always go back. These shoes are very roomy...and are supposed to be that way. They have space at the back, front and round the sides. They feel loose at first but after an hour or two of wearing them at home they were fine and even began to conform to the shape of my feet.  if you prefer a more regular fit I suggest getting a smaller size than usual.  Overall I am happy with purchase and would recommend Crocs to anyone.  They are lightweight and suportive.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 December 2015

Title: "Crocs"
Review: These adult Crocs are just great.My partner wore them all the 2 weeks we were in Florida-both in the water and just walking about - they are excellant-and far superior to the fakes you can get ( obviously! )Definitely worth the reasonable money!! Will buy again and always from  "Amazon"
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 June 2009

Title: Crocs are great!
Review: This is the fifth pair of Cayman Crocs I now own and I love them and so does my 4 yr old daughter.  They are so comfortable and easy to slip on and off, lovely on your feet. I also ordered a pair for my 14 yr old son who claimed he hated Crocs until he 'borrowed' mine to pop into the garden recently.  He now loves them too.  As my husband felt left out he too has invested in a pair. He wasn't sure at first but likes them now too!!!
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 June 2010

Title: BLISS
Review: I've lived with chronic back pain for over 30 years and finding comfortable summer footwear has always been a problem. I've tried lots of different summer shoes and sandals, including Scholl, but none that were comfortable enough to wear all day.Friends who wear Crocs have said they'd be the only shoes they'd wear if they could but I didn't think they'd be any good for me, they look so uncomfortable. But this year I decided to try them, after all I had nothing to lose I could always return them. I chose the Classic Clog because this was the style I'd seen friends wearing.Well, I have to say I was stunned when I put them on, it was like magic, I've never had slippers feel this good to wear. One reviewer said she forgot she'd got them on and nearly went to bed with them on. I thought this was probably an exaggeration but I owe her an apology because you really do forget you've got them on and I nearly did the same.I wear them nearly all the time now, the only time I don't wear them is when it's raining or very cold.At last I have a pair of shoes that allow my feet to 'breathe' on hot days and that don't increase my pain when I wear them all day, aaahh BLISS.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 May 2013

Title: A bit dissapointed
Review: Crocs are my favourite shoes i have been buying them for years, we hada nice little Croc shop in Meadowhall that i used all the time until it closed recently :(So i decided to order a pair of Crocs from Amazon they arrived quickly but when i tried them on felt a little tight even though i had ordered the size i have worn comfortably for years, i decided to keep the as i thought that they must give as my other pairs have always been so comfy from the start, anyway they are still tight and feel a size smaller than the ones i nomally wear even though it says there the same size so i have returned to wearing my old pair as these just dont feel right :(
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 February 2012

Title: Size 10 Crocs
Review: Size 10 Crocs review.I bought these as the I lost the ones I got from Primark, which were much cheaper, I tried to buy some more there but they did not have any.These are a touch pricey, I was thinking of returning them as they did initially feel a bit small, but I kept them and glad I did.  They are not as light as those from Primark. But not a major problem.They are very comfortable, go on buy them, only real downside is the price.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 April 2012

Title: Converted to Crocs !!!!!!!!
Review: Well, where to start , hmmm......  Well, I was amazed how quickly they were delivered, many thanks !I have only recently discovered Crocs,  and I can honestly say that they are the BEST things I have ever worn on my feet !  I suffer with plantar spur tendonitis ( whatever it's called.. or policeman's heel ),  and these Crocs are the only footwear which relieves my pain and discomfort.  They even help my knees too,  because I can walk properly in Crocs.  I splashed out and bought a pair of work Crocs too, and I can now get through my 12 hour shifts in the care sector without being on  my hands and knees , nor hobbling like I'm crippled !!  With my work Crocs, because they're not vented and I have been blessed with the world's most sweaty feet, I do have to wear a little pair of trainer socks so my feet don't slip about in them.I was concerned about some previous reviews saying that the Crocs seems to be smaller sized ,  but my size 5's are perfect !!I wear Crocs all the time , round the house, walking the dog- even in muddy fields, it feels so funny to have the mud squelching round your feet and toes, then just swill your feet in the nearest puddle or stream !! lol !!  Perfect on rough terrain too.Bung them in the washer if they get smelly or dirty... and just shove them straight back on your feet, no need to wait for them to dry !  Irritating stones in shoes just find their way out again.I am totally converted to Crocs, for the comfort and practical reasons.  The first time I wore them, I was concerned that the nubs would make my feet sore, but nope, they don't.  A little piece of heaven for my feet.  !!!!!!
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Neon Magenta
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 July 2014

Title: My new purple crocs
Review: I am a size 6.5 and have bought Crocs before and bought W6/M8. However, the Crocs I have purchased in the past were made in China but as they are on the large size but fitted me. So I ordered a pair of size 6,only to find that they were too small! This is because they were made in Mexico and are the correct sizing. So if you're a size 6.5 be sure to order size 7!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 July 2013

Title: Hmmm!
Review: I've always fancied a pair of crocs so decided to go for them as they seemed such a reasonable price. The colour was fab but these were enormous. I'm a size 7-8 depending on who's footwear it is, I would actually recommend going down a size. I have sent them back and asked for a refund, seller very helpfully and very quick in refunding payment. I would actually deal with them again.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 June 2013

Title: crocs adult clasic black
Review: just received my crocs today,and to say that i'm pleased with them would be an understatement,this is my first pair of crocs so i wasn't sure what to expect having previously put off buying them due to the way they look,but they are so light and comfortable that i havent taken mine off since i received them first thing this morning and i can honestly say that i recomend them 100%,so if the look of these is putting you off i recomend that you go ahead and buy them anyway,i prommise you wont be disappointed,i like these so much in fact that i'm about to buy another pair for my friends birthday,a truly first class product with a first class service to boot.

I kept them but they started to rub my toes after wearing them for a couple of hours so I gave them to my daughter who takes a size smaller than me and they fit her perfectly, so be warned! Take my advice and order a size bigger.

Review: Crocs are great and the service was very fast.They arrived in the next 3 working days. Very good price and service.I would use them again!

Title: Are these genuine Crocs?
Review: I have owned 3 pairs of Crocs over the years. I purchased these and they felt they were made of inferior material to my previous pairs. I returned them to Amazon and the replacement Crocs were just the same. The rubber is harder and jars the feet when walking in them, so I have to question if these are genuine Crocs?
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 June 2013

Title: Size warning
Review: Ordered UK size 6 and received ones with a label saying 5.5. Amazon were quick to replace the item and the next pair had a label saying size 6. However, the sizing on the bottom of the Crocs was identicle to the original pair sent so they were no different to the pair I returned. I would strongly recommend future customers to purchase a half size bigger than required if u always buy the same size shoe i.e. I always take a 6 so I need  a 6.5 in these for them to be comfortable. I have obviously kept the item as it has been delivered as ordered but I don't think they'll get much wear! It would be good if the company made people aware of the possible sizing issues.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 July 2014

Title: Purple!
Review: I ordered my normal size but these are a bit on the big side so probably could have gone smaller. Also they aren't as dark purple as they look its more brighter but hey purples purple so am overall happy. Arrived before date stated so thanks for that :-)

Title: .....not happy ..
Review: i wore lots of crocs shoes ..... and comparing this to the one i bought in soccerworld this is one is pale in comparison ... the size is a bit small ,and the materials use was a bit hard ( not comfy) .... this is made in mexico and the one i bought in soccerworld is made in italy ...

Title: Great product but on the big side for size stated...
Review: These are very sturdy sandals, well made and colourful BUT I had to return them as they were too large for the size stated for me.  I don't know why this is as I have purchased many pairs of Crocs previously and always found them to me spot on for the size.  I returned them (Amazons return service is very easy to local shop) and went back to my usual Shayna Mary Janes which are great!

Title: Too big
Review: I bought these in a UK size 6 and they are massively too big. I have kept them as I only use them in the back garden to pop out water the plants and feed the rabbit or get to the garage. I love the colour though and they are comfortable.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 27 August 2013

Title: not a total crock...
Review: i suffer from plantar fasciitis,working on a concrete floor in an engineering plant...the boots they supply us are rarely a good fit, or comfortable long-term....i was advised to try these by a friend who used to do nursing.now wearing them all day long at home,pottering in the garden,garage,driving...sooo comfy,wide fitting ,(you first think they will fall off continually),recommended :),only wish they did steel toecap version to wear at work...p.s.,shop around well,mine were £17 inc.p&p,some places charging at least double that...yours, comfortably smug..,jinx
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 January 2015

Title: I am sending them back
Review: They are not like the classic crocs we are used to. They are too wide on the heel. I would say they are as widw as the front part. Therefore the strap is smaller. They are not comfortable.  I didn't notice this in the photo they show in the page. I am going to return them.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 June 2013

Title: First Crocs - very comfortable
Review: These are my first Crocs. I wanted shoes for wearing around the house during the better weather - comfortable but easy to slip on and off. These Crocs definitely fit those requirements. Straight away I could feel the solid support in the soles. I wear them without the support strap in place at the back.Size wise I normally take a UK 11. I found it a bit confusing when choosing a size. At the time Amazon automatically suggested the Crocs unisex size M10/W11 as they know I normally wear UK 11. Confusingly in the drop down menu there was an option for UK 11 aswell. I had to compare the different sizes on Amazon, Crocs UK and Crocs Europe. I ended up going with UK 11 as it corresponded to the European size 46 which I get in Ecco shoes.Also note on the Crocs website they have different fittings. The ones I received were a 'roomy fit'.This is the data with my shoes - Amazon were the direct seller:Size: unisexUS: m12Euro: 46-47UK: m11/m12Roomy fitMade in Italy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 April 2016

Title: the fit is perfect and extremely comfortable
Review: After having read several reviews from people who had had crocs, I ordered my first ever pair, when they arrived I noted the country of origin (as had been mentioned in a few of customers reviews) and mine were made in Italy, the fit is perfect and extremely comfortable. I have a broad foot with a high instep and an arthritic joint at the base of one big toe, but these crocs are a really comfortable wear. I cannot recommend them highly enough. Brilliant!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 June 2015

Title: Hated it
Review: Can't think why so many people love these, I hated them, hated the nubbles under your feet, the inflexibility of them, hated everything about them!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 August 2013

Title: Keep trying to find the right fit
Review: I have tried a few different styles of clogs but returned to the classic to get the right length and width. In a shoe I take a UK size 7, but the recommended M6/W7 was too small so I picked the M7/W8 and they feel just like my original clogs slightly wider and longer that I would have in a shoe but great in a clog. These clogs are made in Italy and have 8 and 10 on the sole which I assume means M8 /W10 but it is very difficult to understand the sizing of crocs as they are made in several different countries which all have different sizes to the UK shoes. Trying them seems to be the only way of getting the right fit.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 June 2016

Title: It's a pair of crocs
Review: It's a pair of crocs would have bought the cheaper ones if they made them in my size hence the it's ok

Title: crocs unisex adult

Title: FAKE crocs
Review: Not genuine crocs as advertised! Fake imitation, not Worth £17.99! Poor quality, the sort of thing you would find at a cheap seaside shop. Also did not even receive the correct colour that I ordered.

Title: I'm ashamed to wear them in public but behind closed doors I love them
Review: Aside from the usual shame of wearing Crocs I have to say I love them. I do admit that I've never been in public wearing them but for around the house and garden they are just great. They are great to just slip on and walk around the garden, wouldn't recommend cutting the grass in them as they just get full of grass.Fit very well and are super comfy, I just wish they are more publicly acceptable!
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 September 2016

Title: Crocs as good as they usually are.
Review: As usual the Crocs fit well - I like them loose so always buy a size or two too big. I have problems with my joints and back and my shoe of choice is always Crocs, they make a real difference to my pain levels.Crocs are a bit like Marmite, you either love them or hate them - I fall within the former camp!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 November 2015

Title: First class, easy to keep clean, and comfy to use a slippers.
Review: Can't go wrong with crocs.No matter how many times people call them.You just can't beat them for comfort.I wear mine as slippers in the house, I also have a pair for the garden.They don't end up stinking like some slippers can. They are comfortable. Your feet can breathe. And above all else, when they a mucky they go in the sink, the dishwasher or the washer on cool, and come out good as new.We all wear these as slippers in our house. I cant recommend them enough.
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 December 2016

Title: Way too large for equivalent UK size
Review: I ordered a UK Size 9 and was supplied twice (one was a replacement) with US size 10 which were way too large and no relation to a UK size 9. I suppose I could have ordered a UK size 8 but I just can't be bothered in case they don't fit either. On the positive side, they were of good quality.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 July 2015

Whilst on holiday, after 3 days of wearing, the fastening that holds the rear strap on, unclipped somewhere on the beach. Couldn't find it anywhere. So went to return, but the return window is only 30 days from purchase!!!!! The fastening feels cheap and shoes just fall off now.... Useless

Title: It's been about 6months now and I feel like these crocs have molded to my feet
Review: I am a size uk 4. And that is the size I ordered. When I first put them on I wasn't too sure if I should keep them or send them back, only because the fit was so snug. It's been about 6months now and I feel like these crocs have molded to my feet. I use these crocs for work.  I am on my feet all day and in an environment where environmental hygiene is paramount. I like that I can wear them with or without socks and that they can be washed. If I purchase them again I will consider getting one size up, or half size if they do half's.
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 18 May 2017

She loves them too, and agrees that wearing them constantly around the house is great for pain relief. As other reviewers have mentioned, be prepared to try a couple of sizes before you find the right fit. They are wide at the front, which is nice - no toe crunch.

Title: Not Happy
Review: I suffer from plantar fasciatis in both heels and was recommended these crocs by a friend who had suffered from the same ailment and got great relief from this type of shoe.  Within half an hour of putting them on I was in complete agony and spent several hours afterwards off my feet as I was unable to even hobble, never mind walk.  Needless to say I was very disappointed as I expected to be able to walk easier and relatively pain free once I wore them.  However, they did arrive in excellent time and were comfortable once I put them on, shoe size, width etc. was spot on.  My problems only began once I actually started to walk in them.  Perhaps this type of shoe helps mild plantar fascitis but it is definitely not good for the more debilitating type.  I would recommend these shoes only for people who do not suffer from pain in their feet.
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 January 2013
