Title: Here is some size guidance for buyers based on my experience!
Review: I did select the size I wanted luckily, but I found the way the sizes are written in the option list potentially confusing and I would think other potential buyers might find the same! So, to help future buyers, you may find it useful to know that I am a ladies 6.5UK size and I selected "6 UK (M)/ 7 UK (W)" from the size options listed, which was just right. So ladies who are only just a size 6 might find the size "5UK(M)/ 6UK (W)" a better fit. For those of you who have bought Crocs previously, and know what Crocs size fits you as labelled on the sole, you might also find it helpful to know that the sole of the "6 UK (M)/ 7 UK (W)" Crocs I bought actually says "7M  9W". I therefore presume that the size listed as 5 UK (M)/ 6 UK (W) says "6M  8W" on the sole, and so on. The Crocs I received are made in Italy.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 August 2015

Title: New Crocs to replace my old ones
Review: Ordered these in the size i had had before and made sure that they came from Italy but when the size 4 came were much too small. Returned for a size 5 exchange was very easy and replacement ones came quickly, but i HATE them. I measured them against my old ones which now have hardly any tread on them as i have worn them to death and they seemed the same size however wore them for a week on holiday as felt fine for a couple of days but then they rubbed and i have HUGE blisters on the sides of my heel and little toe. The next size up would be much too big and i never had this problem with my old ones, so as i have worn them for a week will try them again when my feet have healed up and if they are still as uncomfy will bin them. Very disappointed as i loved my old crocs and expected these to be as comfy so dont know what the problem is.
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 June 2013

Title: UK Sizing Incorrect
Review: These genuine Crocs were not a UK size 12 as advertised and as per the Crocs label.  I have been buying my Dad size 12 Crocs for years without any problem with the sizing.  His Crocs that fit have the number 12 on the sole.  These had a number 13 on the sole but the label clearly stated "UK 12".  They were too big.  My Dad has mobility issues and having shoes that fit is imperative to his being able to walk safely and confidently.  Unfortunately I could not return as I trusted the label which I had removed and had written my Dad's name on (he lives in a care-home).  This has put me off buying genuine Crocs on-line.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 April 2017

Title: Shrunk
Review: My husband previously bought a pair of crocs and we left them by the garden gate to use in the garden. Unfortunately, they shrunk! Size 8 became size 6 (mine are size 5, they are slightly bigger than mine) so there is no way that my husband’s feet can be fitted in. But they were comfortable, so I decided to buy him a new pair, bigger than his normal size! However, when he had a try, they were just about the right size for my husband’s feet! I didn’t want to have a pair of size 7 in 1-2 years of light use, so I had to return them and buy an even bigger pair! So complicated! Not very happy.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 October 2020

Title: Amazon asked me how I liked this product
Review: I don't like this product. I hate this product. Along with Onesies they are my most hated clothing items. My brother however, wanted them for Christmas so I bought them for him. I'm considering disowning him.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 15 December 2013

Title: Very comfy!
Review: I bought these for my boyfriend for his holiday. He kept wearing mine last time and so I thought only fitting to get him some. They were very comfortable for him and he had quite a few colour choices too. He even wore them back in the UK on hot days! People say they aren't fashionable, but my goodness they are so comfy. It's like walking with flexible and comfortable polystyrene on your feet. They're so light, you forget that you're walking with shoes on.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 January 2020

Title: Great quality, comfort & durability
Review: Loved these from the moment I bought them. They have very good support and are quite hard wearing. I mostly wear them as slippers, with a few trips outdoors and they are still going strong.Pattern on the sole has worn, but there is still plenty of padding between me and the floor. I also find them quite warm. They are better than other slippers I have used in that they have air holes, so my feet don't get overly hot in the house. Very comfortable and long lasting.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 September 2019

Title: Inconsistent sizes - buy in a real shop
Review: This is the 3rd pair of Crocs I have bought online. Always same size, for my father and myself. However, this time, although the specs are exactly the same (as shown on the soles) the crocs are 2 cm shorter than previous pairs. We only noticed this fault when I gave the crocs as a gift to my dad, who lives overseas. It is frustrating and embarrassing. Also, it is very inconvenient to bring the crocs back to the UK, ship them back, etc. Very poor experience due to these nonsensical, inconsistent sizes. My advice: buy your Crocs in a normal retail store, as Amazon has proved unreliable in relation to sizes.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 December 2012

Title: Suddenly I see what the fuss is all about
Review: Previously I've been left nonplussed by the appeal of Crocs. I have long, narrow feet, with high arches, and every pair I ever tried on were just plain old uncomfortable. I'd long since given up hope of finding a pair that were comfortable enough for me to wear for more than three minutes. They always felt too tight or like they were about to fall off or too short or...Then I tried on a pair of these, and was surprised and impressed by how comfortable they were. I have to have the strap round the back of my foot, but when I do, they're very comfy, and feel very firmly on my feet without being too tight.I love the nubbed soles, they are just textured enough to give your feet a gentle massage without being distracting or annoying.In use, they're incredibly light and comfortable. My preference is for shoes you can forget you're wearing, and these definitely fit that description to a tee. I usually walk round the house barefoot for preference, but these I will keep on and forget I'm wearing even in doors. At the same time, I can happily walk round in them for several hours without any bad results.I wasn't convinced how comfortable they'd be, since they're basically kind of plastic. I remember loathing jelly shoes and similar. However, the material has not got sweaty or unpleasant to wear even on the hottest days I've worn them, and they're so well ventilated that my feet feel fresh all the time. The light foam material is surprisingly soft and forgiving to touch, even though the shoe as a whole feels fairly sturdy. Granted, I've only had them a few months, but they don't feel like they're about to fall apart on me or anywhere close.Last but not least: the colour. I confess, I bought the candy pink purely because they were the cheapest option in my size. They looked inoffensive in the picture, and I'm partial to a bit of pink, so I figured they'd be OK. Actually, they're really pretty and feminine - I was impressed. The colour is a very delicate, pretty pink, and has a decidedly pearly look about it. Obviously these aren't smart, formal shoes, but for crocs they're surprisingly attractive. Instead of being relegated to home and garden, I've worn them out and about to people's houses and to the shops without feeling like I was being a total scruffbag!In short: I'm a convert. Clearly, with crocs, one needs to experiment to find the ones that suit, but once you do... These babies will be used till they fall apart!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 September 2013

Title: My favourite comfy shoe
Review: My crocs are so comfortable and help cushion metatarsalgia in one of my feet. I wear them for gardening and generally out and about and have several pairs in different colours.  They are a loose fitting sandal type shoe with a good range of sizes.  Hope they make them forever!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 October 2020

Title: Not happy.
Review: Had wrong size delivered. Not happy.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 June 2017

Title: A point to remember...
Review: I bought my Crocs years ago - when they were made in Italy.Nowadays, they all seem to be made in - yes you've guessed it - China.It's not an improvement in my opinion, as the rubber seems less flexible and the sizing is definitely iffy.I got my last pair - Crocs Relief, made in China ! - through Crocs and despite some reviews saying they came up " larger than size ", I chose a half size larger than usual and they were still a snug fit.THIS pair fits me perfectly, BUT I bought ONE WHOLE SIZE LARGER than my usual size 5, and when compared to my " old " Italian made, size 5s - they are SMALLER THAN THEM !!!So buyers,be aware of the sizing element.This pair was well priced though, and I DO recommend Crocs - they are really not that nice looking, but if you have foot problems ( I have Plantar Fasciitis ) or just wide feet, they are great !.
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 22 August 2013

Title: Amazing stuff!
Review: I nearly purchased some Cocs about five years a go, but ultimately chose not to because I thought they looked ridiculous, regardless of how comfortable they supposedly were!I have finally given in and bought a pair, perhaps it's the fact I'm five years older and nearing forty?!I have to say they are amazing; they are so comfortable and a joy to wear. They feel great on the sole of your foot, and the level of comfort and support when walking is first class.Yes they do look a little silly perhaps, and I have promised my fiancee I won't be wearing them out of the house, they have been specifically purchased for use in the back garden; but then again promises are there to be broken!I'm very happy with this purchase, and yes, I'm a Croc convert!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 July 2012

Title: Too small, despite ordering the correct UK size
Review: Too small, despite ordering the correct UK size.  I always fit into UK size ten and half or size 11 shoes.Despite the fact that Amazon converts Crocs's american sizes to UK sizes in the ordering page, these crocs shoes were still too small.  When wearing them without the strap at the back lowered, they were OK.  But when wearing them with the strap lowered my toes nails scraped the the end of the shoe and it made the fit uncomfortable.I recommend you use Amazon's excellent "wardrobe" service where you can order many items of clothing in different sizes and then return the unwanted items without paying for them. The return process is easy, just rebag the items in the resealable bag , stick the return label on it and take it to a Royal Mail location.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 May 2019

Title: Made in Italy
Review: Looking at other reviews, I was a little concerned that I might get Crocs made in China. However, I can confirm that the navy Crocs I bought direcly from Amazon UK in August 2013 were made in Italy, both sizes 4 and 5. I first bought UK size 4, as this is my normal size, but they were small in length. I exchanged them to UK size 5, which are better in length. They are very wide, though; but this is the nature of Crocs, I suppose. I am happy with them as I wear them only by the pool or beach and not in the street.Buying shoes online and getting the sizing right is quite tricky. If it helps anyone, after some years of experience, I now decided that for women's UK size 4, I should sometimes be ready to get size 3 if the shoes are from Europe (e.g. Fly London) or size 5 if the shoes are from North America (e.g. Crocs; they are originally from Canada even if made in other countries these days). But I would always try size 4 first, naturally.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 September 2013

Title: True size and comfortable
Review: Having ordered directly from Crocs a Mens size 9 (M10 W12, made in China on the sole) , the shoes were a actually too large and had sharp spikes in the footbed , they were returned. Although these say the same size the sole (made in Bosnia), they are a true size 9 and the footbed is comfortable . Very pleased.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 July 2020

Title: love 'em
Review: Love these.. comfortable and convenient. Stick a pair by the back door to stop your kids running round the garden in their socks. Impress your partner with your new found sense of style. Ok maybe not the last bit. Kind of sorry I didn't go for Tangerine tho or a glow in the dark pair...!?
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 March 2019

Title: Love them
Review: I needed to replace my fake crocs from last summer but the cheap ones this summer didn't seem to fit properly.  I wear them all the time. They have gradually replaced my slippers during the day - great when you realise you have popped outside to put the washing out and it was wet and muddy - you just pop them under the tap - not so easy with fluffy slippers!  So when I found these at sale price I was over-the-moon.  I am a 6.5 and I bought size 7. They are comfy and versatile and they were also the only shoes I could squeeze on with swollen ankles for the last three weeks of my pregnancy. They are easy to put on when you just need to pop out to the car etc.  How did I ever manage without a pair.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 October 2009

Title: Crocs adult classic sandals
Review: Usually I take size 5.5 shoe but the size 5 sandal fits well (as long as toenails clipped!). The width is very good - space to spread your toes. I walk for miles in the countryside wearing these sandals (they have begun to squeak in protest when walking on pavements).  They keep your feet cool even on the hottest English summer days.  Added bonus is that I can join my dog in the river for a paddle.  They are very easy to clean.  Now I want to purchase a variety of colours:-)
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Chocolate
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 July 2014

Title: The shoes are fine but everytime I order a pair for one of ...
Review: The shoes are fine but everytime I order a pair for one of the family I have to return them several times. I follow the guidelines for the shoes but they are either too large or too small. Why can they not be consistent with the size guide.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 June 2017

Title: Crocs !
Review: Bought these size fives for my wife, who kept 'borrowing' my size eights, and she is absolutely delighted with them. Well made, hard wearing, very comfortable to wear for even prolonged periods with or without the strap. Soles give good grip too.They are quite generous in size, and rather than 'go up' half a size from our normal fittings (5.5 and 8.5/9), we 'went down' half a size and they fit perfectly.Couldn't recommend them more !
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 June 2012

Title: Confusing sizing
Review: Having read all the other reviews about being careful when choosing the right size, I made sure to really note the size and gender when selecting a suitable pair of CROCS......BUT if it is unisex, as this is, then there is no option of male or female and by selecting 8 it means men's 8, and women's 10.  Why can't this be made clearer?  I will have to exchange them now.  What a shame.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 July 2014

Title: Pop on, pop off !
Review: Great shoe, Ideal for back door garden duties.If dirty just wash in the shower or under the tap ! Job done...
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 October 2019

Title: Excellent outdoor shoes
Review: Wanted some lightweight shoes for the garden, and do not like wearing opened toed sandals as I always catch my toes on something! These are excellent as cover the toes but are very light and comfy, as well as being totally waterproofHaving the strap that can be used round the heel is great if you need to keep them on and not slip offWill be buying another pair so can keep a pair at boh the front and back door.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 June 2012

Title: Great crocs
Review: I absolutely love these crocs especially in the bright colours. They're like walking around in the most comfortable of slippers and very durable. I bought two pair a couple of years ago and wore nothing else - even at work in the winter I would change into them and wear them around the office. I was really upset because they've now worn through under the toes so was really pleased to find them here.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 June 2013

Title: Crocs
Review: They saved our holiday , as my other half broke her foot before we went on our holiday and there was a time when I thought it was over but friends at work recomended these shoes to me so I got her a pair and you know something, holiday aside it has been 2 weeks since we came back and she is still wearing them. Will recommend them to every one. 5 star.  Gents think about it ,,,,, how much you can save.  Holiday to turkey £1000. Kebabs £5. Smile on her face walking painlessly with thoes Crocs shoes , priceless.
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 November 2011

Title: Cross rule!!!
Review: The navy blue crocs  that I purchased recently are of the same brilliant standard as always. My family have been croc  wearer for the last 5 to 6 years and have not found a more comfier alternative. I have all styles and they are all equally comfy. They also last very well and i can get at least a years wear out of them before they start to look scruffy . Long live crocs , they rock. xxx
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 June 2013

Title: Perfect Crocs
Review: I ordered these Crocs for my husband, who had worn his last identical pair into the ground after 4 years of regular use. He is a size 9, but has very wide feet, so I ordered size 10/11. They fit perfectly. Although I ordered the same colour, this pair of Crocs seems to have a nicer finish than his last pair. Very pleased with this purchase.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 August 2014

Title: crocs are a saviour for ankle replacement
Review: My husband had an ankle replacement which was very successful but shoes became a major problem due to the enlarged joint and swelling when wearing normal shoes.  We bought some Crocs 3 years ago recommended by a friend to use on the beaches in Malta to prevent being stung by jelly fish.  We didn't see any jelly fish but he never looked back after that.  The Crocs have been in continuous use ever since, both with casual and smart gear and he is now on his 3rd pair.  The ankle doesn't swell even after a whole day's wear and he's prepared to put up with the jokes when he forgets to change shoes for special occasions.  We struggled to find any in the local shops this summer and are thankful for Amazon to keep up the stock.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 17 November 2009

Title: Soooo Comfortable
Review: Crocs are feet savers!  They may not look the prettiest - but once you have worn a pair of Crocs you will never regret your purchase!  These were a really good buy.  I have found that Crocs can vary in size depending on where they are manufactured.  However, being a shoe size 6 - I ordered in Crocs sizes M 6 / W 8 and they fitted perfectly! I would recommend Crocs as the most comfortable shoe in the world!
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 May 2010

Title: personal
Review: Husband was so delighted to have a pair of Crocs and they fitted perfect
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 July 2019

Title: CROCS Cayman ... everything they promise to be
Review: Having seen the hype about these rather ugly, clown-like shoes, I thought them sufficiently raved-about to try a pair.  Now the owner of four pairs, I convinced my other half to buy a pair for 'round the house'.  This recent purchase is his second pair - we are both thoroughly 'won over'.  Light, comfortable, colourful, fun and affordable.  Advice on fitting would be definitely try them on first, as the sizes do differ.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 November 2009

Title: Good product
Review: Reliable product, fits as expected. Thanks to the quality of the plastic material it is very easy to clean them every so often.

Title: finally replaced the old ones
Review: these were for my partner and he was holding on to his 10 year old pair as crocs seemed to have stopeed this design and the others he tried were not good on his feet. perfect size as others seem to come up smaller and were made of different plastics which were causing a problem. A*
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 July 2014

Title: classic crocs
Review: These crocs arrived in good time. They are quite large but not overly (when they arrived it did say that they were the wide size. It didn't say that in the advert). Very comfortable to wear, can be worn with thick socks for out in the garden. So a good buy for for me.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 July 2014

Title: Happy Feet
Review: My sister has raved about Crocs for years, so when I needed some casual summer shoes that would look OK with jeans or a denim skirt, I decided to give them a try. I'm so glad I did!  When I put them on for the first time, the soles of my feet did feel a little strange for around ten minutes or so when I was walking.  Once I was used to them, my feet were the most comfortable they had been in years.  I now wear them at every opportunity - this summer, I've had lots of practice at checking out how quickly they dry out after being caught in the rain, too!  I can wear them all day and almost forget I have shoes on at all.  This certainly won't be my last pair.
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 August 2012

Title: Love 'em
Review: You either love Croc's or you loathe them. I love them and live in them all summer long and wear them indoors all year round. So light and airy to wear plus dead comfy. They're a godsend in a camper van and almost universally worn on campsites for good reason.
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 13 August 2014

Title: Not the best looking but certainly the best comfort
Review: As I love spending time in my garden weather permitting I thought these CROCS shoes would be a great alternative to my wellies,I have them by my back door to slip on whenever I need to pop outside they are as comfy as slippers, so comfy I even walk my dog to the local field and it does'nt matter if the grass is wet.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 June 2009

Title: Genuine item

Now he has, he wears them for gardening, washing the car, driving - you name it!  I dont think any of my family would be without them now.

Great to wear as the holes allow a breeze (what a lovely feeling!), brilliant to wear whilst driving. The ridges on the soles massage my feet, heaven.

Since seeing a friend wearing them, and hearing him enthusing about them, we have had quite a few pairs.They are great on holiday as you can walk on the beach and in the sea, and they don't seem to come to any harm.If they get dirty they can be soaked or even washed in the washing machine.They are not much use for running or dancing, as you wear them loose, but then they don't claim to be universal.A great purchase.

Title: Crocs - why not!
Review: Love these things!  Great, lightweight, handy to keep in a camp bag for mooching about the site instead of pulling on boots in middle of the night.  Also wearable all day with comfort.  These stay on in a way that flip-flops or open backed clogs don't, so great for driving and "energetic" walking.  Also good for pool/sea side as they don't mind getting wet and they dry really quickly.  Like lightweight multi-purpose "Nature-treks" (just gave my age away there!).
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 July 2010

Title: Very comfortable
Review: Ive only tried these on, not really walked out with them but the product despcription about their comfort is TRUE. This colour cotton candy is just lovely as its not a bright colour but still a nice colour so looks very nice its pearly.  I can feel these are going to be very comfortable for all day wear!  ID recommend these to everyone.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 October 2011

Title: Great shoes - very comfortable - wide fit
Review: I recently had a problem with one of my feet and had trouble walking. I found that Crocs were the only comfortable shoes I could wear, and have been using them exclusively for months on end. This is a third pair, although the others are still in good condition.Recommended for comfort for just about everything.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 September 2010

Title: Just does the job perfectly!

I bought mine for a recent beach holiday and they are terrific on sand... especially when it gets too hot to walk on in bare feet. I wore them throughout the holiday and I'm so glad I bought them. I would say stick to ordering your usual size coz they are roomy. Happy ordering and holidays!

Title: Crocs rule
Review: I bought theses on a recommendation from a friend. I thought they were probably the ugliest shoes I'd ever set my eyes on. Put that to one side because they are the best footwear I've ever bought. They are light and comfortable beyond belief. The strange rubber like material keeps the feet cool and the textured insole keeps the feet alive. I took them on holiday to Cornwall and ended up wearing no other shoes for the entire holiday. They even coped with a long and difficult costal path walk. Cant sing their praises high enough. Need to order another pair because I'm going to wear these out the rate I'm going.
Review_Date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 September 2009

Title: Excellent

Title: Good product but too small
Review: Might be worth noting that Crocs are manufactured in several countries.  They all look the same and are of similar quality but the 'moulds' used in each location can differ by anything up to a full shoe size so you can't always rely on them fitting even if you order identical sizes.  I didn't know about this until after I'd ordered them.  However returning these was very easy and I am waiting for a replacement pair - just a bit bigger!

Crocs Adult Cayman

Review: Die Schuhe passen gut und sind bequem. Da ich sie hauptsächlich im Garten und auf der Terrasse benutzt habe, standen sie logischerweise auch mal in der Sonne - mit dem Ergebnis, dass sie nach nur 3-4 Wochen mindestens 3 Größen geschrumpft sind! Im ersten Moment dachte ich, dass ein Kind seine Schuhe aus Versehen bei uns stehen gelassen hat, weil ich mir gar nicht erklären konnte, wieso ich plötzlich nicht mehr in die Schuhe passte!Dabei wirbt der Hersteller mit "der perfekte Schuh für Strand oder Boot!" Nur darf die Sonne eben nicht länger scheinen. Amazon hat kulanterweise den Schuh zurückgenommen und den Kaufpreis erstattet, obwohl die Frist zur Rückgabe bereits verstrichen war.Da bereits mehrere Käufer von demselben Phänomen berichten, sollte man den Schuh auf keinen Fall kaufen, wenn man vorhat, ihn auch draußen zu benutzen. Sehr enttäuschend.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 10 July 2018

Review: Nach dem meine alten Crocs ca. 5 Jahre auf dem Buckel hatten mussten neue her.Sie hatten bei mir echt viel zu leisten!Gartenarbeit, Renovieren, Sommerurlaube in heißen Regionen(Türkei, Thailand), Segeltörns etc.Sie waren immer und überall dabei.Auf den Fotos mal ein Vergleich.Man sieht auf den Fotos auch, das sie sich im laufe der Zeit etwas verformt haben und sich auch die Farbe etwas verändert hat.Sie haben im letzten Sommer lange in der Sonne auf den heißen Terrassenplatten gelegen.Dadurch sind sie ein bisschen schmaler, aber nicht kürzer geworden.So lange hält sonst kein Schuh bei mir!Die alten Crocs waren "Made in Italy" und und neuen jetzt sind es auch.Sie riechen gar nicht! Haben die alten auch nicht.Es scheint an der Farbe zu liegen, wo sie hergestellt werden.Ich kann diese Crocs in dunkelblau auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 5 February 2017

Review: Finger weg, Schuhe schrumpfen bei Wärme. Verkäufer lehnt Gewährleistung mit folgender Begründung ab:"Wir entschuldigen uns für Ihre schlechten Erfahrungen. Leider ist das Schrumpfen der Crocks jeden Sommer ein häufiges Problem. Wir verstehen Ihre Unzufriedenheit vollkommen und es ist unsere Politik, jeden Kundenanspruch zu untersuchen, aber in diesem Fall können wir nicht viel tun. Die Garantie von Crocs deckt keine physischen Schäden ab, die durch Missbrauch und falsche Handhabung durch den Benutzer verursacht wurden.Einige Fälle, in denen Crocs-Schuhe wahrscheinlich schrumpfen, sind:- wenn in einem heißen Auto gelassen;- wenn in der Spülmaschine gewaschen;- wenn draußen in der Sonne gelassen.Dies ist kein Herstellungsfehler.Im Internet finden Sie verschiedene Tutorials, mit denen Sie Ihre Schuhe reparieren und wieder anziehen können."Die Schuhe wurden -naturgemäß- draussen gelagert, da sie als Gartenschuhe Verwendung finden sollten. Bei der ersten Hitzeperiode (35 Grad) sind sie geschrumpft und passen -vorher Gr. 46/47- nun noch Gr. 40. Wir haben seit vielen Jahren viele Modelle an Crocs, aber diese "Qualität" ist uns neu. Keine Kaufempfehlung!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 11 July 2019

Review: Ho comperato l'ennesimo paio di Crocs: queste sono di un bell'arancione "energetico". Sono allegre e non fanno l'effetto ciabatta. Per chi dovesse comprare il primo paio: ricordatevi che calzano un po' piccolo: io porto il 36 e compero 36-37 ma le uso come ciabatte e non utilizzo il listello posteriore (lo ruoto davanti); se lo utilizzassi compererei il 37-38. Lo stesso vale per il modello "imbottito"
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 24 March 2017

Review: Premetto che è la prima volta che acquisto un paio di crocs... Sono casalinga e sfrutto queste scarpe dalla mattina alla sera: mi sembrava assurdo pagare 30 euro per delle brutte ciabatte in plastica, ma siccome le ho trovate in offerta a 20,99 e avendo anche un po di mal di schiena, ho detto " le provo, mi faccio il regalo di Natale!" .Adesso, dopo un mese, il mal di schiena non me lo ricordo neanche più! Inoltre ieri ho lavato le nuove crocs ed, il tempo che stavano asciugando, ho indossato le vecchie ciabatte (una sotto marca tipo le crocs)... La differenza è scioccante: con le originali il piede è più riposato e rilassato, rialzato di circa 1 cm; la camminata è più sicura nella scarpa, non si scivola! Ciliegina sulla torta: sono Made in Italy!Conclusione: le ricomprerei ad occhi chiusi, sempre ed ovviamente se scontate!!!
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Ice Blue
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 18 January 2018

Review: Nachdem ich 2 Paar "Billig-Crocs" hatte, die sehr schnell kaputt gegangen sind, habe ich mir im Angebotspreis die Original Crocs bestellt. Und ich bin begeistert! Es ist ein riesen großer Unterschied, ob man wirklich nur Billig-Crocs kauft oder die Originalen. Die Original Crocs sind von sehr guter Qualität, es sind sehr stabile "Plastik-Schuhe" mit dicker Sohle; sie sind viel stabiler wie diese dünnen "windigen" Billig-Crocs.Allerdings muss ich hier eins bemerken: ich habe die hellblauen Crocs gekauft, die sind "made in Italy". Es gibt aber andere Farben mit made in China, made in Mexico oder sonstige..... also die Herstellung ist offenbar in unterschiedlichen Ländern. Das sieht man aber bereits deutlich auf den Produktbildern, da hier bei jedem Paar Crocs die Sohle abgebildet ist (auf dem das Herstellerland steht).Meine made-in-italy-Crocs sind hervorragend, kein Chemie-Geruch und auch sonst keinerlei negative Punkte. Wie das bei den anderen Crocs ist, kann ich leider nicht beurteilen.Für meine made-in-italy-Crocs gibt es volle 5 Sterne. Spitzen Qualität zu einem Angebotspreis, was will man da noch sagen! Daumen hoch!
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Ice Blue
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 17 April 2018

Review: Ich weiß nicht, warum Crocs es nötig hat, mittlerweile in vielen anderen Ländern wie Vietnam, China undMexico die Schuhe zu produzieren, wahrscheinlich, weil es dort billiger ist. Leider bestätige ich die Rezensionen,die besagen, dass die aus diesen Ländern stammenden Schuhe echt übel chemisch stinken, das habe ich sogarim hiesigen Schuhgeschäft live festgestellt. Ich habe einen Schuh made in Italy gefunden und einen made ich China,der Unterschied war wirklich extrem!Und obwohl auf dem Produktfoto zu sehen war, dass der Schuh in Mexicogefertigt sein soll, erhielt ich gelbe Crocs made in Italy. Sie sind gernauso gut von der Qualität, wie die allerersten,die wir vor langer Zeit gekauft haben. Andere hätte ich auch zurückgeschickt!!Es ist mittlerweile echt schwer, noch welche zu bekommen, die in Italien gefertigt werden. Schade.Wie gesagt, wir hatten Glück...
Size: Size: 8 UK Men/ 9 UK WomenColour: Lemon
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 24 July 2017

Review: Extrêmement déçu. Nous avons acheté 4 paires, une paire pour chaque membre de la famille.Résultat au bout d une semaine toutes les chaussures ont rétrécis !!!J émet de fort doute sur l authenticité de ces crocs, nos précédentes n ont jamais rétrécis.Au final plus personne ne les portent car elles sont trop petites..Merci à Amazon de vérifier l authenticité de ces chaussures car c est scandaleux .Un achat de 4 paires pour rien !!!!
Size: Size: 3 UK Men/ 4 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in France on 24 June 2017

Review: Unico neo é la qualità della gomma, no ne morbida, quindi non ho la sensazione di ammortizzare. Costa troppo per quello ché vale Non soddisfatta del acquisto
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Neon Magenta
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 12 August 2018

Review: Es increíble porque  hace años compré, en un bazar chino, unos de estos por 5 euros y no he vuelto a encontrar otros tan cómodos. Ni siquiera en los propios bazares, donde todos los que encuentro ahora son "Made in Portugal".  En cambio, los que tengo, están hechos en China, y son lo más cómodo que han calzado mis pies. Pero claro: están descoloridos del todo, por el sol y el paso del tiempo y dan pena... Y aún así, siguen siendo comodísimos.Compré estos, que valen bastante más, tras leer las reseñas, y esperando que fueran igual o al menos la mitad de cómodos que mis moribundos zuecos chinos. Pues no.  Mientras que los que tengo tienen forma anatómica por dentro, y carecen de "púas",  estos son completamente planos, no se adaptan a  forma del pie y las gomitas que sobresalen me resultan muy, muy molestas.Otra cosa: si yo tengo el pie ancho, y estos zuecos se me salen, de lo anchos y holgados que son, no quiero imaginar cómo le deben ir a alguien con pie normal o estrecho.No los devuelvo porque mira...  Pero vaya: desde luego no es la mejor compra que haya hecho en Amazon.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 29 May 2019

Review: Habe die crocs in meiner üblichen Größe bestellt, naja: FAST.Irrsinnigerweise gibt's die nur in 41/42 (Zwischengröße), normalerweise habe ich ja NUR 41, aber - habe ich mir gedacht - 40 ist wahrscheinlich zu klein, dann eher 41/42 - denkste! Zu groß, eh klar!ABER:Bei amazon reklamiert, Geld sofort zurück bekommen, Ware musste ich nicht mal mehr zurückschicken, habe die Dinger jetzt meinem Freund geschenkt, der hat 42, passen ihm super, und ich hatte zwei Tage später schon die neuen in PERFEKTER GRÖSSE 40!!!Also, an ALLE: Die Dinger eher ne Nummer kleiner bestellen, fallen sehr groß aus, das mag wohl bequem erscheinen, aber wenn die Dinger beim Gehen von den Füßen fallen, ist das auch nicht sinnvoll, oder?!Danke amazon!
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 31 August 2018

Review: Fan de cette marque, j’achete en toutes les couleurs pour toute la famille. C’est la première fois que je suis déçue de cette marque: laissée sur la terrasse cette été, elles ont rétréci considérablement a ne plus pouvoir les mettre! Je précise que c’est les seules à rétrécir, les autres paires n’ont pas bougé. Inexplicable car chaussures d’exterieur
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in France on 6 December 2017

Review: the size chart is confusing...I ordered a 10 M thinking the M stood for men....obviously doesn't. I got a 10 M women 8 M for men. Do something to simplify the size chart. I gave the small crocs away. Too much hastle to repackage them and send them back. Turns out they have become way too expensive! Bought another pair..and hopefully this time the right size
Review_Date: Reviewed in Canada on 19 February 2018

Review: After ending up in emerge twice in the last month due to an atraumatic knee injury, my family MD, orthopaedic specialist, and rheumatologist all recommended I purchase custom orthotics as my injury was a result of overuse due to constantly being on my feet at work.Seeing as I haven't been able to work, I couldn't afford custom orthotics and decided to give crocs a try.I actually bought this pair for my husband, however I have been wearing them when he is not home (as my pair hasn't arrived in the mail yet). After wearing these around the house for a day, I CAN FINALLY SAY THAT I AM ABLE TO STAND ON MY OWN TWO FEET WHILE WEARING CROCS! NO CRUTCHES, NO FULL LEG SPLINT!I can't wait to receive mine now :D100/10 would recommend. Once I start working again I'm buying a pair for my parents and grandparents too.BIG THANK YOU TO CROCS FOR SAVING MY KNEE!!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Canada on 1 March 2019

Review: Acquistate per l'utilizzo in un reparto ospedaliero.Per me, comode alla perfezione per almeno 10h su 12 di guardia .Il fatto che siano un unico pezzo di gomma le rende facilmente lavabili.Considerate che per la stessa ragione non offrono alcun riparo dal freddo.Prima di queste ho provato dei cloni cinesi che dopo 6 ore non sono più comode. IL MATERIALE CROCS FA LA DIFFERENZA!Portando 43 ho comprato un 43 poi cambiato (nel giro di 3 giorni grazie ad amazon!!) con 42-43 e va LEGGERMENTE largo con un calzino di spugna normale.NOTA PERSONALE : Non ho capito molto le taglie ma se a qualcuno può servire dalla punta dell'alluce al tallone il mio piede è 26,5cm e un 42 sarebbe stato perfetto. Ovviamente è solo un'indicazione. Non posso garantire per tutti i piedi!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 11 November 2018

Review: Die Crogs wurden schnell geliefert.Eigentlich ist 1 Stern zuwenig, aber ich war so irritiert als sie kamen, das ich erst dachte eine Kopie gekauft zu haben.Die Größe ist nun ganz anders als "früher"Ich habe derzeit - wie auf dem Bild zu sehen - ganz alte Crogs die mindestens 10 Jahre alt sind. Nun sind sie durchgelaufen, und einer an in der Sohle ein Loch. Deshalb mussten neue her.Ich habe die Größe, die 37/38 angegeben ist gekauft.Sie passen mir wie erwartet. Dennoch wundert es mich, das die alten eine Nummer kleiner waren, aber dennoch größer sind als die neuen.Also kauft jemand dieselbe Größe wie seine alten sind, werden sie viiiiiiiel zu groß sein.Auf meinen alten steht noch "Made in Italy" auf den neuen "Made in Vietnam". Tja....Außerdem finde ich das die neuen härter sind als die alten. Nicht mehr so flexibel.Fazit:Man kann sie kaufen, zumindest meine Farbe war günstig, aber andere sind teurer, und da würde ich schon nicht mehr empfehlen.Ich bin sehr gespannt wie sie sich in der Sonne verhalten, denn einige schreiben sie würden schrumpfen.Wenn dem so ist, haben sie nicht mal 1 Stern verdient.Meine jetzigen haben in all den Jahren ihre Größe beibehalten.Ich bin gespannt, und sollte dem so sein, das sie sich verändern werde ich leider nie wieder welche kaufen.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 15 March 2020

Review: Era da tempo che le tenevo d'occhio...e dopo aver letto molte recensioni alla fine mi sono deciso e le ho acquistate...lo avessi fatto prima avrei risparmiato almeno 50€ in altri zoccoli simili!!! Non hanno paragoni sono un guanto, morbide ed elastiche ma allo stesso tempo tattengono il piede e ammortizzano benissimo il "passo" al contrario di qualche recensione letta NON sono rumorose anzi tutto il contrario..ma forse riguarda solo il mio paio...sono arrivate oggi 02/05/18 sono 6 ore che le indosso e non le togierei più dai piedi!!! Sono talmente contento che ne ho acquistate un paio anche per mia moglie che come me ha avuto sempre problemi con questo tipo di calzature. CONSIGLIATISSIME!!
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 2 May 2018

Review: Ich habe die Crocs als Gartenschuhe nutzen wollen. Leider sind sie jetzt nach zwei Wochen Aufenthalt auf der Terrasse drei Nummern kleiner und hässlich verformt. Doof vor allem auch, dass die billigen, nachgemachten Crocs vom Ehemann aus dem Discounter nicht eingegangen sind, obwohl sie auch draußen standen. Für den Preis inakzeptabel!!!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 1 June 2017

Review: Me sumo a las ya muchas opiniones que dicen que son muy cómodos. Tengo los pies planos y bastantes delicados y de entrada no me las compre por miedo a que fueran muy duros o se me recalentaran los pies y me han sorprendido muy gratamente. Los llevo todo el día por casa (obviamente no es lo mismo que estar todo el día caminando con ellos) y perfectos. Muy loable que aun estando en verano y usándolos sin calcetines no se me recaliente el pie. Uso una 39 de normal y me he comprado una 40-41 y perfectos, si te quedan algo grandes por lo que sea la presilla que llevan la puedes echar para atrás y es blandita y se adapta muy bien y, no hace rozaduras.
Size: Size: 7 UK Men/ 8 UK WomenColour: Lemon
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 20 July 2018

Review: Ein schlechter Scherz??? Lustig und traurig zugleich. Die crocs haben wir in 46-47 bestellt, haben auch gut gepasst, nach ein Paar Tagen suchte mein Mann seine neuen "großen"crocs :))  Wir wollten es nicht glauben, nach mehrfachen Versuchen die crocs anzuziehen und verdutztem Stinrnrunzeln mussten wir einsehen dass die tatsächlich zu klein geworden waren. Mein Sohn freute sich und meinte: "cool, dann kann ich sie ja haben, wenn sie dem Papa nicht mehr passen!"Seine Freude war nur kurz, den ein Paar Tage später passten sie ihm auch nicht und irgendwann dem Jüngsten auch nicht mehr. Aschenputtel haben wir nicht, also zurück in den Karton und ab zurück zu Amazon!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 16 November 2018

Review: Materiale è leggermente più rigido rispetto ad altre crocs che ho preso in passato, spero siano originali, verificherò se con l’utilizzo sì ammorbidiranno, sono comunque comode ed il colore rispecchia le foto. Bisogna fare peró molta attenzione alle taglie, ho ordinato un 43/44 uomo basandomi su guida taglie, ma sono giustine,  anche se indicato 10 USA equivalgono ad un 42/43 scarso cioè 8/9 USA. Nella foto ho messo di fianco le Crocs nuove e quelle vecchie acquistate da altro fornitore. Come si può notare sono di identica dimensione ma su quelle nuove è indicato 10 USA mentre su quelle vecchie 9.  entrambe penso invece siano  42/43, cioè 8. I produttori cinesi fanno sempre casino sulle taglie, anche se su quelle nuove è indicato made in italy(!?) poi sull’etichetta che sino importare...e su quelle vecchie made in china...che erano sicuramente originali.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 13 April 2019

Review: I've been wearing Crocs for years and have more than 10 Pairs but something is really strange with the sizing of these Crocs.I wanted the color Orange and ordered the same size Crocs that I normally wear Size 10 womens / 8 mens ... oddly enough the Orange Crocs size 10W/8M were bigger (longer) than my other 10/8 Crocs ... weird?I read other reviews describing the same problem with sizing but didn't think they were accurate ... turns out they are.I tried to order a Size Smaller however Amazon didn't have Orange stock in the 9/7 size so I ended up returning them for a refund.I love CROCS and will continue to buy them although I am confused as to why this particular order and size didn't fit.Thankfully Amazon has a great return policy ... Hopefully they get more stock and I'll order again in a smaller size.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Canada on 14 August 2019

Review: Allora... parto basandomi sulle info di altri clienti, che affermano che il prodotto fatto in italia risulta morbido... questo fatto in Messico ha la stessa consistenza dei sabot che potete comprare a 6€ nei vari supermercati...la misura risulta veramente precisissima... quindi consiglio un numero in più. Insomma in conclusione, andate in giro con la scritta crocs... ma la durezza è quella dei sabot da supermercato. Li riprenderei se fossi certo del modello made in Italy... altrimenti no.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 26 July 2019

Review: Die Schuhe wurden als Hausschuhe für drinnen gekauft und sind jetzt schon 3 Jahre in Benutzung.Sie laufen sich sehr gut und federn beim Gehen angenehm ab.Ich bin wirklich überzeugt von der Passform und der Qualität der Schuhe und würde sie als Haus- oder Gartenschuhe immer weiter empfehlen.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 10 May 2020

Review: El color es muy parecido al que viene en las fotos de Amazon. Algo más claro, quizá. En las fotos que he puesto no se ve exactamente igual al color real el ninguna, pero podéis haceros a una idea entre esas y las de Amazon.La talla es amplia. Uso un 39 y pedí 39-40. Al ser unisex, son más anchos de lo habitual para mujer. A mí me sobra más o menos un dedo de largo y me resultan muy cómodas así. Quizá otra persona las prefiera más ajustadas o si tenéis el pie muy fino puede que os resulte más incómoda.Llevo usándolas un tiempo y estoy contenta con ellas. No se han deformado nada y están como el primer día de color.Rebajadas, las recomiendo. A precio normal, buscaría una opción más barata porque creo que es un precio exagerado.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Lilac
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 9 August 2019

Review: Die Crocs wurden wie angekündigt von Amazon geliefert. Zunächst passte auch alles. Habe absichtlich eine Nummer grösser bestellt. Die Schuhe waren angenehm zu tragen. Nach 5 Wochen und einigen Tagen aufenthalt der Crocs auf der Terasse waren diese um min. 2 Nummern geschrumpft. Zudem hatten sich die Schuhe so in Längsachse verwunden das ein reinschlüpfen kaum möglich ist. Das Tragen ist durch die Verwindung auch sehr unangenhem.Der Kundenservice von Amazon ist wirklich sehr freundlich. Ich bekomme ein neues Paar schuhe kostenlos zugeschickt. Ich werde es so gut wie möglich vermeiden die Schuhe in praller Hitze liegen zu lassen, um die Schrumpfung und Verwindung zu vermeiden. Ich habe das Gefühl das die Hersteller von dern ursprünglichen Materialmischung abgewichen sind. Crocs trage ich seit 8 Jahren. Dieses Problem ist in diesem Umfang neu für mich.Ich bin mir am überlegen ob ich 1 oder 2 Sterne geben soll. Ich gebe jetzt einen Stern, weil ich den Schuh eben meistens in den Sommermonaten trage. Sollte die Nachsendung besser halten, werde ich meine Bewertung entsprechend anpassen.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 10 June 2019

Review: Hello -nach ca. 5 Jahren hatten meine letzten Crocs sich von Größe 42 auf Größe 40 verkleinert. Ok. 5 Jahre gehen in Ordnung...dachte ich.Jetzt habe ich mir diese gekauft. Hey - jetzt schaffe ich 2 Nummern kleiner in 4 Wochen. Respekt!Lese Reszissionen und Empfehlungen..."Stell die Dinger nicht in die Sonne...". Geht es noch? Das ist der perfekte Gartenschuh?!Ich suche mir Alternativen, die es reichlich gibt. Der Name juckt meine Hyazinthen nicht.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 26 July 2018

Review: I use to love crocs.  The new crocs are not the same size as the old ones.  As I have many issues with my feet, I have been wearing Crocs for a number of years.  I had read reviews about the sizing not being the same. I do agree.  They are also not making them with same quality as the older ones.  I wrote to Crocs company and said they were not any better than your department store shoe.  Except department store knock offs are much cheaper.  I have loads of knock offs.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Canada on 4 July 2019

Review: Llevo años utilizando este calzado, por tanto para mí ha sido una compra más y  no una novedad de la que pueda comentar nada. Es un zueco cómodo y resistente que lo uso para estar en casa durante el año, para la playa en verano y  tambien  para hacer turismo. La talla es justamente la que es. Al menos en mi caso. Hay gente que opina en pedir una talla menos pero en mi caso se corresponde exactamente  con el número que gasto en todo tipo de calzado.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 11 April 2018

Review: I got this Crocs Unisex Classic Clog for daily usegetting directly from Amazon -pretty much guaranteeCrocs Unisex Classic Clog is originalI use Crocs Unisex Classic Clog and they still like a new - love iteasy to clean and Crocs Unisex Classic Clog is good quality still gong strong even I wear them every day in and around the house... for a price I pay Crocs Unisex Classic Clog is a good buy ...
Review_Date: Reviewed in Canada on 15 November 2018

Review: La verdad es que es un lío con su guía de tallas no corresponde a la medida en pulgadas a la talla real, por lo cual hay que tener mucha suerte para que le quede a uno, esta fue demasiado justa si usas calcetín ya no te queda igual, es importante que se entienda que la compra se realiza por internet por lo cual las tallas deben de ser claras y esto es lo que no tienen ustedes, ojala se tomen la molestia de ser mas prácticos con esto
Size: Size: 4 UK Men/ 5 UK WomenColour: Chocolate
Review_Date: Reviewed in Mexico on 2 June 2018

Review: Die Schuhe passten gut und waren bequem. Da sie hauptsächlich im Garten und auf der Terrasse benutzt wurden, standen sie logischerweise auch mal in der Sonne - mit dem Ergebnis, dass sie nach nur 3-4 Wochen mindestens 3 Größen geschrumpft sind! Dieses zeichnet nicht wirklich Qualität für diesen Schuh aus, sehr enttäuschend. Ich werde versuchen, über den Kundenservice von Amazon noch was regeln zu können, da die Frist leider abgelaufen ist. Ich kann nur hoffen
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 24 June 2019

Review: Ero molto incerta su questo acquisto ma ho deciso di provare contando sul reso gratuito. In realtà, le adoro! Il materiale è leggero e molto morbido: appena messe sembrano grandi e scomode ma dopo cinque minuti ci si abitua e non si vorrebbe più tornare indietro. Pur essendo di plastica non puzzano e non surriscaldano il piede, inoltre non scivolano per terra e si asciugano in fretta se capita di bagnarle. Consiglio il proprio numero o al limite un mezzo numero in meno.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 5 May 2018

Review: Il y’a un problème de coïncidence avec la référence Noir (Black) entre la taille sélectionné au moment du choix et la taille qui vous sera livré. Si vous sélectionnez la pointure 42/43 EU (la taille qu’il me fallait) dans le menu déroulant des tailles et que vous l’ajouté au panier, cela vous mettra du 43/44 EU dans le panier et vous serez livré avec du 43/44 EU… donc elles seront trop grande. C’est d’ailleurs la seule taille sélectionnable dans cette plage de taille pour cette couleur. Je m’en suis malheureusement aperçu trop tard et j’ai passé commande. J’ai revérifié plusieurs fois et avec d’autres couleurs et tailles. Il semblerait que ce problème n’est qu’avec cette couleur et cette taille. Ce n’est donc une erreur au niveau de la préparation de la commande mais c’est une erreur informatique au niveau du référencement. Dommage, je vais devoir les retourner et partir sur une autre couleur pour être sûr d’avoir du 42/43 EU.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in France on 26 February 2018

Review: Calzado todo terreno. En mi caso las uso para pasear a los perros. Me parecen cómodas y prácticas. Un poco cantoso el color pero fue por precio. Cogí un número más grande y van bien, pero seguramente mi número también irían bien. Bien empaquetadas, protegidas y llegaron a tiempo, como siempre.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 18 June 2018

Review: Scheinbar nichts unbekanntes.... sie schrumpfen in der Sonne... bei mir nach einem Tage. Hatte mir dieses Paar extra neu bestellt da die alten in einem Atlantik-Urlaub plötzlich nicht mehr passten. Da hatte ich mir noch keine Gedanken gemacht! Nun nach einem heißen Tag in der Sonne und kurzem googeln weiß ich nun das es scheinbar normal ist das dieses eintäuschende Produkt keine Zeit in der Sonne liegen darf.Weniger als ein Stern geht ja leider nicht!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 29 June 2019

Review: Premetto che non sono mai stato un amante di questa scarpa e pertanto le mie valutazioni possono essere inquinate dai miei stessi preconcetti. Ciò detto a dovere di verità,  nulla da eccepire sul servizio di spedizione di Amazon. Avendo un 43 abbondante , ho acquistato per uso domestico con fiducia la misura 43-44 che però ho trovato un po' larga. Non volendo restituire per cambio taglia più piccolo per evitare di ritrovarmi, a detta di chi ha comprato la misura giusta, con un sandalo troppo calzante, ho preferito tenerli. Trovo il prodotto orribile dal design stile infermiere, ma risulta davvero leggero al piede e piacevole con il suo plantare. Trovo anche che si debba calzare necessariamente un calzino anche per casa per evitare che il piede cuocia al suo interno. Non capisco gli entusiasti di questa marca. Buona passeggiata...
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 24 July 2019

Review: Ich habe mir vor etwa einem halben Jahr ein Paar dieser Crocs bestellt und wollte dann noch ein zweites Paar in derselben Größe und selben Farbe.Als ich das zweite Paar erhielt, habe ich zuerst bemerkt, dass diese um einiges enger geschnitten waren als das Paar mit derselben Größenangabe und mir daher überhaupt nicht passten. Bei genauem Hinsehen und Vergleich fiel mir dann auf, dass sich das neue auch sonst von meinem "alten" Paar unterschied. Mein altes Paar war laut Aufdruck Made in Vietnam, das neue Paar Made in Bosnia. Zudem war der neue Farbton dünkler.Offenbar unterscheiden sich die Produkte aus den verschiedenen Herstellerländern doch massiv, daher besteht hier das Risiko, ein für einen "schlechteres" Paar zu erwischen, mein zweites Paar ging daher zurück.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 27 May 2020

Review: Assurdo, acquisto una scarpa estiva del marchio Crocs conosciuto nel mondo, oltre che sinonimo di qualità, lasciata al sole in un caldo pomeriggio di giugno arrivata a sera si è ristretta di due taglie, assurdo chi studia i materiali di queste scarpe dovrebbe avere un'attenzione maggiore. Peccato che non posso più fare il reso
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 30 June 2020

Review: Das ist das 2. Paar Crocs, das ich mir gekauft habe. Vor vielen Jahren in rot, ( Made in China ) die trage ich immer noch, aber sie sind nicht mehr schön. Also jetzt ein neues Paar. Gleiche Form, gleiche Größe, andere Farbe, jetzt Made in Bosnia. Ich habe die Schuhe 3 Wochen während des Campingurlaubs getragen und sie danach in den Schuhschrank zuhause gestellt. Jetzt wollte ich die Schuhe zu Gartenarbeiten anziehen und sie sind so klein geworden, dass ich nicht mehr hineinkomme.Ich wollte die Schuhe zurück schicken, das geht aber nicht mehr, da ich ein paar Tage zu spät gemerkt habe, dass die Schuhe jetzt nur noch eine Kindergröße haben.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 5 July 2019

Review: Prese per sostituire un vecchio paio ormai pieno di crepe sul davanti. La taglia era quella che cercavo (consiglio di usare la tabella di conversione come riferimento, ad esempio un 42/43 EU corrisponde ad un 9-11 US), il modello Classic in particolare calza un po' abbondante. La confezione non è il massimo, visto che sono arrivate in una busta di plastica trasparente semi-aperta senza alcuna scritta, quindi consiglio di lavarle o pulirle con delle salviette igienizzanti prima di utilizzarle. Quelle da me ordinate risultano essere Made in Italy e rispetto al prezzo di listino in negozio ho risparmiato all'incirca il 33%
Size: Size: 8 UK Men/ 9 UK Women WideColour: Cerulean Blue
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 19 June 2017

Review: La calidad crocs es inigualable por eso he comprado un par de zuecos clásicos para toda la familia. Esta vez hemos disfrutado decidiendo el color.He comprado el color verde militar porque si soy amante de la naturaleza y me gusta mucho llevar las crocs.Me gusta llevarlas a todas partes por eso buscaba un color personal.Estoy muy satisfecha con la compra.Recomiendo seguir comprando Crocs porque aunque existen muchas copias muy baratas la calidad del zapato es incomparable.Usadas todo el verano en montaña, suelo de la calle y en la playa y están como nuevas como se ve en las fotos.Cualquiera que haya tenido crocs sabe que es cierto. Muy recomendables.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 24 August 2020

Review: Yo tengo una 38-39 según el zapato, asi que compré una 38-39, que me queda bien para ser una croc, pero un peliiiin grandes asi que al segundo par, me atreví a comprar una 37-38 y me van como un guante, estas las he dejado para zueco de jardín para faenar, las otras para dentro de casa todos los dias.Es curioso porque tengo zapatos 38 y 39 pero ningun 37, asi que compra la croc mirando media talla para abajo.Dicho esto, fenomenal, porque me las puse y no me las quité. Empiezo a dar verguenza.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 2 February 2020

Review: De zapatos calzo un 42 de talla, vivo en España. Compré la talla 41-42 de color NEGRO, que es equivalente a unas 10-12 porque ya tenía unas blancas con esa talla, pero compradas en una tienda física. Me llegaron y como se ve en la fotografía hay mucha diferencia con la misma talla, me quedan muy pequeñas.Pensé que lo mismo estaban mal mis anteriores blancas, es muy raro que el mismo fabricante cambie tanto de talla y las he utilizado sin cerrar por detrás.El tema es que compré a mi mujer otras en otro vendedor de color ROSA talla 39-40 que es el equivalente a ellos 7-9 y pude comprobar que incluso son más grandes que las que compré 41-42.Al final se ha quedado mi mujer con las negras porque no hay nada peor que ir con un calzado pequeño.Es decir son las tallas de este vendedor las que son más pequeñas que las otras y eso quiere decir que o están mal rotuladas o no son auténticas
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 28 June 2020

Review: Nach den gemischten Rezensionen hier und den offenbar großen Qualitätsunterschieden, war ich unsicher, ob es eine gute Idee ist, die Crocs online zu kaufen.Tatsächlich bin ich aber sehr begeistert. Ich hatte bisher nur einmal eine Billigkopie gekauft, die ich auch ein Jahr lang gerne getragen habe. Allerdings war die Sohle so dünn, dass man kaum auf steinigem Boden gehen konnte. Kein Vergleich zu den Crocs - die haben eine schön dicke Sohle und fühlen sich am Fuß ganz anders an, richtig angenehm darin auch weite Strecken zu gehen. Ich habe seit ich die Crocs habe keine anderen Schuhe mehr getragen, außer bei Regen.Ich habe ein Paar "made in Italy" erwischt - diese Variante würde ich also auf jeden Fall empfehlen.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 4 September 2019

Review: Très déçue par cette commande "bleu navy" que j'ai renvoyée car c'était de fausses crocs, made in china, trop grandes, trop larges, dures, inconfortables alors que le plastique des vraies crocs est souple et doux. Auparavant j'avais commandé une paire d'un autre bleu, à peine plus cher, made in italy, très agréable au pied mais un peu trop petite (38-39). Je croyais donc recevoir le même modèle dans la taille au-dessus (39-40). Hélas non. Dans ce modèle de crocs, c'est la loterie. On ne peut se fier ni à la taille, ni au prix. Dommage, je me passerai de crocs car je ne veux pas courir le risque une troisième fois!
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Navy
Review_Date: Reviewed in France on 6 May 2015

Review: Sono purtroppo costretta a rivedere la prima recensione ... Dopo qualche giorno di utilizzo più intensivo al mare, le ciabatte si sono ristrette di almeno una taglia ed ora non calzano più... con il risuotato di essere inutilizzabili.Lascio, per completezza, la prima entusiastica recensione scritta non appena ricevuto e provato il prodotto... Ottime, calzano alla perfezione ed hanno l'inconfondibile qualità delle vere crocs. Arrivate imballate nella confezione originale, non fanno la puzza delle imitazioni economiche, indossate sono come un guanto e non provocano fastidi né sfregamento
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 3 July 2020

Review: Agradezco que me los enviaron una talla más abajo, porque afortunadamente me han quedado muy bien; si me los hubieran entregado en la medida que pedí me habrían quedado grandes.Son de excelente calidad, muy cómodos y seguros para traerlos en la casa, ya que tienen buen soporte para los pies al caminar; a diferencia de las sandalias de hule que continuamente se doblan.Las bolitas de la plantilla ayudan a dar descanso a los pies, y los materiales evitan el sudor (a diferencia de las que son imitaciones).
Review_Date: Reviewed in Mexico on 27 April 2020

Review: Ich wollte mir kürzlich ein weiteres/neues Paar Crocs kaufen. Laut Beschreibung und Artikelname ist dieses Produkt exakt "bauglich" zu meinen bisherigen Schuhen. Als die neuen Schuhe dann geliefert wurden, die Enttäuschung: Leider handelt es sich um ein völlig anderes Material (fester, kaum weiche/nachgiebiges Fußbett mit sehr unangenehm festen "Noppen"). Ich habe die Schuhe daher zurückgesandt und werde nun in Ladengeschäften nach Ersatz suchen müssen.Ich kann mir diese Sache nur so erklären, daß Crocs an verschiedenen Produktionsstandorten weltweit hergestellt werden und es hier von Standort zu Standort massive Abweichungen in der Qualität geben muß.
Size: Size: 9 UK Men/ 10 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 11 May 2015

Review: Ich hab mir diese Dinger bestellt, weil ich keinen Bock mehr hatte, nur für den Gang zum Briefkasten immer meine Stiefel anziehen zu müssen. Ich wollte einfach was einfaches, wo ich die Füße reinstecken und bis zum Hauseingang und zurück marschieren kann.Das geht mit diesen Dingern wunderbar.Für meine Quanten passendes Schuhwerk zu finden ist nicht immer einfach, ganz zu schweigen von einigen orthopädischen Schwierigkeiten, die meine Auswahl noch weiter einschränken.Daher war ich, und bin ich, angenehm überrascht davon, wie bequem die Dinger sind. Ich zieh sie jetzt sogar in meiner Wohnung oft gar nicht mehr aus und erwäge daher, der Hygiene wegen, noch ein paar anzuschaffen.Die Dinger sind natürlich keine Sicherheitsstiefel, und außer Haus würd ich damit nicht herumlaufen. Ansonsten kann ich nur sagen, für meinen Zweck, schnell an und ausziehen, und Gebrauch nur innen, sind die perfekt. Kaufempfehlung.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 8 October 2018

Review: il nr 38 39 corrisponde a un piede 23,05 cm ... ho messo una Stella perché dal primo utilizzo la scarpa risulta essere di gomma che riscalda e il piede suda e puzza e il plantare è fastidioso al piede scarpa troppo larga e troppo stretta di altezza...il giorno stesso le ho gettate nella immondizia...mi vergognavo  anche a chiedere il reso....prodotto improponibile...
Size: Size: 5 UK Men/ 6 UK WomenColour: Bronze
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 10 July 2019

Review: By now it's not news for me to say that these are comfy and super light. The little nubs on the insole are nice.But buy a half-size smaller or even a full size. Unless you're getting these because you require a LOT of empty space in your shoe, these are really roomy and kinda flop around as you walk. The strap keeps them on your feet, though.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Canada on 5 May 2020

Review: Calzado utilizado durante hora en un restaurante y en cocina, la verdad que son una pasada de cómodos, el material es muy ligero y se agradece al final del día, dado que los pies no acaban para nada cansados, decir que también en el entorno donde se trabaja muchas veces pues esta mojado, y la verdad es que no patinan para nada.En cuanto al precio, parece elevado en comparación con otros modelos que se parecen, pero es que estos no tienen nada que ver con los de otras marcas y par mi valen cada céntimo que cuestan.Muy satisfecho con la compra y con la calidad de esta marca.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Black
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 6 April 2019

Review: Me han gustado mucho la comodidad. Las llevo todo el dia por casa y para andar por el jardin. Parecen resistentes tras 2 meses de trote diario. Los dibujos de la suela aguantan muy bien. Se agarran muy bien al suelo incluso con suelos mojados. Las últimas que tuve marca china daba unos patinazos deolimpiada. A pesar de los sucias que se ven en las fotos se limpian bien :) Las recominedo.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 5 April 2019

Review: Le ho prese blu elettrico... Esteticamente non le amo...sono sincero...però piuttosto delle babbucce del nonno... se non altro con queste non si scivola e si può andare anche fuori, anche se ci fosse umido o bagnato. Io ho preso un 43/44 e sono leggermente abbondanti...cmq niente di che... specie se d'inverno si indossano i calzini. Sono ben salde al piede nella camminata. Unico appunto: io la stringa non la tengo dietro alla caviglia, per comodità di indossarle "al volo", quindi la tengo in avanti: in questa posizione devo dire però che ogni tanto la stringa esce e si appoggia sul collo del piede e bisogna rimetterla apposto... la toglierei ma non si può. Cmq per 20 euro scarsi direi che vanno benissimo e sembrano molto resistenti.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 14 October 2019

Review: Habe mir selbst vor ein paar Tagen Crocs in Schwarz Größe 47 bestellt, habe sie nun jeden Tag im Gebrauch.Ich habe mich immer lustig gemacht über Leute die im Sommer oder auch sonst zu jeder Gelegenheit mit Crocs durch die Gegend geschlufft sind... Nun wo ich selber welche trage weiß ich warum sie es tun, meine güte sind die Dinger für ein paar Gummilatschen bequem! Und die genoppte Sohle massiert sogar noch nebenbei den Fuß, sehr angenehm!Die Schlappen sind bequem und passen wie angegossen, durch das optionale Fersenband kann man das Herausrutschen der Füße aus den Schlappen vermeiden, oder man klappt es nach oben um sie schnell an und auszuziehen.Wichtig, die Crocs NIEMALS im Sommer in der Sonne stehen lassen, egal welche Farbe oder welches Modell, da sie sonst mindestens um eine Nummer eingehen!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 21 January 2019

Review: Habe mir und meinem Mann die Crocs in unterschiedlichen Farben und Größen bestellt. Gedacht waren die Crocs für den Garten. Zu Hause angekommen, haben uns die Crocs gleich zugesagt. Diese waren von Anfang an bequem und die Farben passten auch. Sind genau wie im Internet abgebildet. Haben diese von Anfang an auf der Terrasse gelassen. Mit der Zeit sind diese vermutlich durch die Sonneneinstrahlung leider 1-2 Größen kleiner geworden, sodass uns diese nicht mehr gepasst haben. Farbe hat sich jedoch gar nicht verändert. Finde das ziemlich schade, da diese eigentlich bequem waren. Nun sind wir auf normale FilpFlops umgestiegen. Diese ziehen sich in der Sonne nicht zusammen und können problemlos auf der Terrasse bleiben.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 30 July 2018

Review: Los Crocs  son conocidos por ser muy cómodos, pero me resultaban un poco caros, así que cuando por casualidad los vi a un precio buenísimo, me decidí a comprar unos y quince días después compré un segundo par en otro color .Los puntitos que tienen en la plantilla ayudan a favorecer la circulación y no molestan nada.Por las reseñas que había leído no parecía fácil acertar con la talla. Pero recomiendo comprar tu talla habitual.Lo que sí noté es que son muy anchos, después te acostumbras, pero si tienes el pie estrecho como yo, al principio piensas que se te van a salir.Después de unos días de uso, me parecen tan cómodos como dicen. Ideales para casa o para la piscina porque se lavan sin problema.Totalmente recomendables 👌🏻 y sobre todo, mirar bien y comparar, porque hay diferentes modelos y tiendas con precios diferentes . 💰.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 1 September 2020

Review: Pensaba que con este precio serían de imitación, pero nada más lejos de la realidad.Unas crocs auténticas, ideales para exteriores en verano, y con unos calcetines gruesos, perfectas para estar por casa.Lo mejor:-Comodidad-Calidad de los materiales-Número de pié exacto-Buen ajuste trasero sin apretar-Planta rugosa con efecto antideslizanteLo peor:- Frías al tacto, sobretodo en invierno- Algo rígidas, pero con el uso van tomando flexibilidad.- No aconsejables para salir de la ducha, ya que vas dejando un rastro de agua.Calzado idóneo para los meses de calor ya que si te mojas los pies, el diseño de la zapatilla, expulsa el agua facilitando el secado.En cambio, en invierno, su uso es más para interiores, pero mejor usarlas con calcetines, mantienen su comodidad, pero estarás más calentito.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 15 October 2020

Review: Uso le crocs da più di 10 anni, estive e invernali (queste chiuse per intenderci)🌟PRO - QUALITA'La qualità della gomma crocs è indiscussa nonostante sempre di gomma si tratti, ma io non ho mai provato delle ciabatte in gomma così comode, resistenti e confortevoli.La durata è incredibile, e spesso le ho dovute cestinare solo per l'usura della para inferiore che era diventata liscia per l'utilizzo e rischiavo di scivolare (specie in estate)🌟CONTRO  - PREZZORitengo che  il prezzo  del sito ufficiale sia eccessivo, qui su Amazon si trovano spesso scontate e allora il rapporto qualità/prezzo è eccellente!TUTTI DOVREBBERO PROVARE LE CROCS !Le straconsiglio e se la mia recensione è stata utile puoi segnalarlo qui sotto. Grazie
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 19 October 2020

Review: Ho altre 2 paia di crocs taglia 10-12 un paio made in italy l'altro paio made in china. Queste che sono arrivate sono made in bosnia e mi trovo costretta a fare il reso sono davvero troppo piccole. Amazon come sempre impeccabile per quamto concerne le spedizioni .
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 2 June 2019

Review: belle molto belle! come potete vedere dalle foto le scarpe sono mady in italy. il mio problema era il colore perché c'era pure il giallo chartreuse e avevo il problema se le foto fossero state scambiate.invece non lo erano affatto e quindi posso confermare che il colore che ho scelto ovvero questo giallo lemon corrisponde pienamente. tempi di consegna impeccabili come sempre. sulla misura direi che è un pò grande, vi spiego io ho un 39 di piede è per me risultano grandi quindi ci vuole una 38 ma siccome li ho ordinati per mio figlio che è in crescita e momentaneamente anche lui ha un 39 sono risultate un pò larghe ma recupererà a momenti, morale vestono un pò grandi il consiglio è se avete un piede che calza normale le altre scarpe e siete una donna prendete un numero più piccolo. spero di essere stata utile. grazie ad amazon prezzo sempre appetibile rispetto ad altri.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 27 February 2018

Review: Llevo con los mismos crocs hace siglos, y pensé que era hora de cambiar. Esta oferta me pareció interesante y quise poner un poco de color en los pies, pues los míos son grises... Quedan perfectos según la talla española, aunque creo que es conveniente un poco más grandes de manera que el dedo se pueda mover arriba y abajo y quede un espacio; ¿para qué? porque son más cómodos y porque si se ponen calcetines tipo trecking de invierto quedan más sueltos y no apretados. Sin embargo en los anteriores el tallaje era otro, el 6-8 mientras que éstos, que son el 7-9 son más pequeños... Así que cuidado con las tallas; los ya usuarios no tendrán problema. Los recomiendo al cien por cien.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 23 December 2020

Review: Tenía un esguince y el pie hinchado como bola por lo que me era muy difícil usar zapatos , así que decidí buscar unos crocs y los amoooo . Ahora los crocs son mi calzado favorito para ver series , descansar e incluso para el Home Office XD.Lo pros:-  La calidad y el material son muy buenos.- El precio, elegí los importados a $760 aprox . En México se consiguen siempre arriba de mil .- Son los originales- Son anchos. Los puedes usar solos o con calcetas, sin duda serán cómodos para personas con el pie ancho.- Son cómodos . Tengo un problema ya que al usar chanclas planas por horas hace que  me duelan los talones. Con los crocs no pasa eso  ya que tiene soporte para el arco y una buena forma para la suela. Puedo traerlos todo el día .- Colores sólidos y fáciles de lavar- Llegaron antes de lo estimado- TIP para la Talla correcta. En mi caso solo me fijé en la talla que uso en un calzado que ya viene en talla Europea o americana y pedí esa misma para los crocs .  Soy 26 en Mex, 39 en EU y 9W en USA,  pedi esos y me quedaron perfecto.Aún no encuentro ningún pero para el producto . En el caso que encuentre algo actualizaré la reseña .
Review_Date: Reviewed in Mexico on 27 November 2020

Review: Ho comprato queste Crocs misura 48-49 per mio marito che ha il 46 di piede, è alto 190 cm, fisico atletico, anche se pesa circa kg 100 - 105.Il 48-49 gli sta perfetto.E' da quasi una settimana che gliele ho regalate, e ogni giorno non fa altro che dirmi come ci sta bene e, soprattutto, che non ha più dolori alla schiena.Trova questo tipo di Crocs molto "ammortizzate" e comode.E' così contento che vorrebbe comprare un altro paio anche per uscire di casa.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 3 May 2020

Review: Pas cher mais en fait ce sont des fausses. Honte à vous de tromper les clients.Il suffit de regarder la qualité pour s en rendre compte. Je vous les renvoie mais il y a tromperie sur la marque
Review_Date: Reviewed in France on 5 July 2019

Review: Il materiale appare poco morbido rispetto ad altre Crocs made in Italy, comunque il rapporto qualità/prezzo sembra buono considerati la taglia ed il colore per un costo (scontato) inferiore ai 20 euro. Non avrei speso 34 euro. In ogni caso ribadisco che sotto quelle che ho ricevuto è scritto Made in Bosnia o Vietnam. Le finiture sono buone ed il materiale non emana cattivo odore. In famiglia ne facciamo uso domestico per praticità, comodità e funzionalità, in alternativa alle altre pantofole. Consigliato, se il prezzo è scontato.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 6 January 2020

Review: Dovevo cambiare il crocs con una misura più grande, complimenti al servizio resi che Amazon offre! La misura giusta mi è arrivato in brevissimo tempo!👍 Avevo bisogno delle scarpe comode per la casa, visto che i dottori hanno sempre queste tipi di scarpe ho scelto così comprarne pure😉. Questi crocs sono top riguardo comodità, qualità, proteggono bene i piedi e staticamente sono molto carini per i suoi colori vivace. Attenzione alla misura, io porto 38 anzi a volta 37, la misura 37/38 per me era piccola, quindi adesso invece con la misura 38/39 mi stanno perfetto. Consigliatissime a tutti!
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 31 October 2017

Review: Ogni tanto cado in tentazione e acquisto le gemelle cinesi...... ma niente da mettere in confronto con l'originale! Ottimo prezzo, ottima calzata (il numero viene rispettato non serve prendere numeri più grandi), ottimo materiale e cosa che forse non tutti sanno queste ciabatte non puzzano neanche dopo settimane senza lavarle!!!! Non parlo dell'odore di plastica che nella concorrenza a volte è davvero sgradevole, ma proprio dell'odore che si può creare portandole quotidianamente per ore.Unica cosa contro è il tipo di plastica. Ho acquistato questo modello x me (39/40) e uno uguale solo di colore diverso (ultraviolet) per mia figlia (37/38). Non so per quale motivo quelle di mia figlia sono più morbide sia al tatto che indossandole. Sembra proprio un'altra plastica.Comunque ottimo prodotto, indistruttibile e molto comodo. Le consiglio e le riacquisterò.
Size: Size: 6 UK Men/ 7 UK WomenColour: Lilac
Review_Date: Reviewed in Italy on 26 April 2017

Review: 2012 habe ich 2 paar Crocs gekauft: Das eine Paar steht im Haus und wird nur Indoor getragen, das andere steht das ganze Jahr im Garten und ist somit Sonne, Regen und Kälte ausgesetzt. Das Paar, was draußen steht, ist über die Jahre um ca. 2 Schuhgrößen geschrumpft und total hart geworden. Nun habe ich 2019 endlich für draußen ein neues Paar bestellt und leider merke ich jetzt schon, dass der Schuh kleiner wird! Von daher ist für mich die Qualität leider schlechter geworden. Auch wenn sie nach wie vor super bequem sind, schön aussehen und es eine tolle Farbauswahl gibt, nur noch 3 Sterne für die Bewertung der Qualität.
Review_Date: Reviewed in Germany on 20 May 2020

Review: Siempre había querido tener unos Crocs porque son conocidos por ser muy cómodos, pero me resultaban un poco caros, así que cuando por casualidad los vi a un precio buenísimo, me decidí a comprarlos.Por las reseñas que había leído no parecía fácil acertar con la talla. Yo uso normalmente la 38 o 39 en deportivas y pedí el 37/38 y me queda bien.Lo que sí noté es que son muy anchos, después te acostumbras, pero si tienes el pie estrecho como yo, al principio piensas que se te van a salir.Después de unos días de uso, me parecen tan cómodos como dicen. Ideales para casa o para la piscina porque se lavan sin problema.Totalmente recomendables 👌🏻
Review_Date: Reviewed in Spain on 21 August 2020
